text2:
Here Are All Of The US's Largest Food Deserts
What is a food desert? Imagine having to get all of your groceries from a gas station or local corner store bodega where you're forced to select bags of chips and frozen pizza as sustenance. This is the reality for the millions of citizens who live in food deserts in the United States. The United States lacks equal access to food across communities and food availability is scarce in portions of the country known as food deserts.

In 2014, the United States Department of Agriculture performed a food access study and defined a US food desert as an area where 33 percent of a city’s residents live more than one mile from a supermarket and 20 percent earn below the poverty line. Many residents of food desert locations do not have cars and lack access to public transportation, making them essentially unable to get to a grocery store. Food desert causes are mostly related to economics. Big chain supermarkets have a hard time turning a profit in impoverished areas, which results in places without food cropping up across the country. The effects are devastating. The obesity rates in these areas are generally higher, meaning life-threatening illnesses like diabetes and heart disease are on the rise. Luckily, new laws and various grassroots organizations are currently working to make healthy, affordable food available nationwide. On a local level, many cities have not just opened up food co-ops and food markets in impoverished areas. Local corner stores are also expanding their inventory. Instead of using all of their shelf space for junk food, they are providing more healthy fresh food options.

To learn more about the issue and what's being done, scan this list of the top food deserts in the United States.

text1: Rev. Mbaka Releases 2020 Prophecies Rev. Fr. Ejike Mbaka, the Spiritual Director of Adoration Ministry in Enugu, southeast Nigeria, has prophecies for the year 2020. Naija News reports that Rev. Mbaka released the prophecies during his Adoration Ministry in Enugu when he was addressing his congregation last week Thursday. Rev. Mbaka, who predicted President Muhammadu Buhari’s reelection, was quoted to have said during his 2019 Passover ministration that there would be more hard times for Nigerians in 2020. The Spiritual Director of Adoration Ministry said Senator Hope Uzodinma, the 2019 APC governorship candidate for Imo State, Southeast Nigeria, would take over the governance of Imo State from the Incumbent governor, Chief Emeka Ihedioha. While maintaining that all the prophecy in Adoration ground has comeless but do not fight me. “I am saying this in respect of those who may want to come after me because of the message. If you do that, the God of Moses, Elijah and Elisha will deal with you. I am only a messenger of God”
text2: 2020: Stop complaining about government A member of the House of Representatives, Hon. Mufutau Egberongbe, has urged Nigerians to enter 2020 with a resolution to play positive roles in how they are governed. In a New Year message he signed and made available to DAILY POST, Egberongbe, who represents Apapa Federal Constituency on the platform of the All Progressives Congress (APC), said it was time Nigerians are interested in how they are governed. The lawmaker, however, commended citizens who have always given direction to the government as well as political officials in the current administration. “We constantly need to play active roles in the way we are governed. We should be able to come up with ideas and suggestions on what the government should do and how the government should be run,” the lawmaker said. Egberongbe noted that 2019 came with some challenges for and fights with the executive. “Fighting the executive arm of government does not show our independence or prove that we are working. Anyone who has followed us since we took office would see that we have done a lot in a short while,” he said

text1: Mamak'ta koronavirüs önlemleri Mamak'ta koronavirüs önlemleri Mamak Belediye Başkanı Murat Köse, Kovid-19 nedeniyle istihdam yükünü omuzlayan esnaf için bir destek paketi hazırladıklarını bildirdi. Mamak Belediye Başkanı Murat Köse, Kovid-19 nedeniyle istihdam yükünü omuzlayan esnaf için bir destek paketi hazırladıklarını bildirdi. Köse açıklamasında bu kapsamda 3 ay süreyle işgaliye harcı, çevre temizlik vergisi ve ilan ve reklam vergisini almayacaklarını ifade ederek, "Kepenkler açıldığında esnafımızı bir nebze rahatlatmak, imkanlarımız dahilinde bir katkı sunmuş olmak istedik" dedi. İlçede 14 noktada maske dağıtım istasyonu kurduklarını, atık maske ve eldivenler için de 100 özel çöp konteyneri yerleştirdiklerini belirten Köse, vatandaşlara maskesiz sokağa çıkılmaması uyarısında bulunduklarını da kaydetti. Öte yandan açıklamada sokağa çıkma yas hayvanı için yaklaşık 250 kilogram mama ve 300 litre su bıraktı. Bu yılın ilk 3 ayında 220 hasta ve yaralı hayvanın tedavisini yapan ekipler, bine yakın aşılama ve 500'ün üzerinde kısırlaştırma operasyonu gerçekleştirdi." ifadelerine yer verildi. Kaynak: A
text2:
Mamak Belediyesinden bir yılda 5 bin 500 kişiye evde sağlık hizmeti
08.01.2020 12:30 | Son Güncelleme: 08.01.2020 12:30

Mamak Belediyesince ilçe sınırları içindeki hasta, yatağa bağımlı, kimsesiz ve yaşlılara yönelik sürdürülen evde muayene ve sağlık hizmetinden bir yılda 5 bin 500 kişi faydalandı.

Belediyeden yapılan yazılı açıklamaya göre, vatandaşlar arasında büyük bir memnuniyet uyandıran evde muayene ve sağlık hizmeti kapsamında hastalardan enjeksiyon, pansuman, sonda takımı ve kan alımı yapılıyor.

Evde Sağlık Hizmeti için başvuruda bulunan tüm Mamaklılara eşit bir şekilde hizmet verildiğini ifade eden Mamak Belediye Başkanı Murat Köse, "Vatandaşlarımızın desteğe ihtiyaç duydukları dönemde onların yanında olabilmek, ihtiyaçlarına cevap verebilmek en kıymetli belediyecilik hizmetidir. Bu anlayışla iyi günde kötü günde Mamaklıların en büyük destekçisi olmaya devam edeceğiz." dedi.

Kaynak: AA

text1: Family tell of pensioner’s ‘heartbreaking’ burglary ordeal as new appeal launched The family of a pensioner who died during a burglary in her home spoke today of the dread she must have felt as a fresh police appeal was issued. Maureen Whale, 77, collapsed struggling to breathe as she dialled 999 on December 4, 2018 in Barnet. In the call, Mrs Whale said: “I’ve just been burgled. Yes, two young men just went into the house and walked off with my handbag. I’m shaking, I’m sorry.” Asked her name, she gasps: “Maureen, I can’t talk, I’m sorry.” There is silence as the operator pleads: “Hang on in there, please.” A post-mortem examination gave the cause of Mrs Whale’s death as coronary hearts death as manslaughter. A £20,000 reward is on offer for information leading to the burglars’ prosecution. Anyone with information is asked to contact police on 020 8785 8099 or call Crimestoppers anonymously on 0800 555 111
text2: Grimsby homeowner 'held at gunpoint' by armed robbers Sign up to FREE email alerts from GrimsbyLive - Daily Subscribe Thank you for subscribing See our privacy notice Invalid Email A man was held at gunpoint when robbers raided his home and stole items last night. There was a large police presence including armed response teams in the Hainton Avenue area of Grimsby around 7.30pm. One man has been arrested and an imitation firearm recovered by police. Police checked vehicles in the Nuns Corner area and on the Nunsthorpe and Bradley estates for several hours after the armed robbery. (Image: GNP) Humberside Police are continuing their investigations today. A police spokeswoman said: "A man has been arrested following reports of an armed robbery at an address on Hainton Avenue in Grimsby last night. "It was out non-emergency 101 line quoting crime reference 16/39713/20 or, if you’d prefer not to give you name, you can call the independent charity Crimestoppers anonymously on 0800 555 111. In an emergency always dial 999.

text1: Présidence de la CDU : un patron en probation Quiconque est élu nouveau président lors de la conférence spéciale du parti en avril doit être réélu en décembre. Cette procédure n'est pas sans risque, mais elle offre une grande opportunité. Le message de la Konrad-Adenauer-Haus semblait sobre et contenait un coup d' Etat politique: Armin Laschet, Norbert Röttgen et Friedrich Merz, les trois principaux concurrents pour la présidence de la CDU, a mutuellement convenu lundi soir que tout à la fin d'Avril se produire lors de la conférence spéciale du parti, est considérée comme une soi-disant élection partielle. Pour cette raison, tous les membres du conseil d'administration et du présidium seraient à nouveau déterminés lors de la conférence régulière du parti en décembre. Rien de vraiment excitant, c'est ce que ça ressemblait, et pourtant c'est assez différent. La décision a des conséquences pour le gagnant ; il a déjà négocié l'accord, mais avec le recul oblige tout le monde à travailler ensemble. Après tout ce qui s'est passé récemment, c'est une tournure des événements surprenante - et pas une mauvaise base pour tirer une nouvelle force de la crise à la fin
text2: BERLIN – Laschet et Merz annoncent la candidature de la CDU Le ministre-président de Rhénanie du Nord-Westphalie Armin Laschet et l'ancien chef de groupe parlementaire Friedrich Merz ont officiellement rejoint Norbert Röttgen, chef de la commission des affaires étrangères du Bundestag hier (25 février), dans la course pour succéder à Annegret Kramp- Karrenbauer à la tête de l'Union chrétienne-démocrate (CDU). Laschet, un modéré qui soutient la politique de la chancelière Angela Merkel, a annoncé qu'il se présenterait avec le soutien du ministre de la Santé et candidat potentiel, Jens Spahn, qui, à son tour, deviendrait le chef adjoint du parti. "Nous devons réunir notre parti et notre pays, et je veux me présenter pour cela", a expliqué Laschet. Spahn vient de l'aile conservatrice du parti, et ensemble, ce duo vise à unir les deux de la CDU ayant Spahn comme candidat à la vice-présidence, Röttgen, qui a également annoncé officiellement sa candidature la semaine dernière, a déclaré à la presse qu'il prévoyait de présenter un femme comme adjointe. (Sarah Lawton | EURACTIV.de

text1:
O dynamice po 10 maja i sympatiach Polski powiatowej
Dynamika przy Wiejskiej po 10 maja może być zaskakująca. Tak jak sympatie Polski powiatowej, która zdecyduje o wynikach wyborów 
 Polityka 
 opublikowano: 26 lutego 2020 
 aktualizacja: 26 lutego 2020 
 Sejm / autor: sejm.gov.pl 
 REKLAMA 
 Podziel się 
 11 
 Dodatkowym, nieco niedocenianym aspektem nadchodzących wyborów prezydenckich będzie skala i rodzaj dynamiki, jaka zostanie uruchomiona wynikiem majowego głosowania. Nie chodzi bowiem tylko o to, kto na najbliższe pięć lat zasiądzie w fotelu prezydenckim, ale i o to, jakie efekty przyniesie taka czy inna decyzja Polaków. 
 REKLAMA 
 Sygnalizował to na marginesie swoich ostatnich wypowiedzi Jarosław Kaczyński. Prezes Prawa i Sprawiedliwości ujął to „stanem emocjonalno-psychologicznym”, jaki - jego zdaniem - może zdominować polską politykę po majowych wyborach. 
 Jeśli pan prezydent uzyska mandat na kolejną kadencję, nasi zwolennicy poczują się wzmocnieni, jeśli nie – w oczywisty sposób będzie to dla nich negatywny sygnał. Biorąc pod uwagę temperaturę dzisiejszego sporu politycznego, to nie jest okoliczność bez znaczenia 
 — ocenił w „Gazecie Polskiej” Jarosław Kaczyński. 
 Na korytarzach sejmowych i w gabinetach polityków dużo spekuluje się na temat tego, jak mogłoby to wyglądać w praktyce. Prezes PiS wykluczył scenariusz wcześniejszych wyborów nawet w przypadku przegranej Andrzeja Dudy w wyborach prezydenckich, niemniej jednak można spodziewać się dość wyraźnego procesu frustracji w obozie rządzącym, który raz po raz zderzałby się z wetem głowy państwa. 
 Powiedzmy sobie też szczerze: jest przynajmniej kilka, jeśli nie kilkanaście nazwisk w klubie PiS, które zaczną się wówczas rozglądać za innymi barwami politycznymi. My wtedy bardzo chętnie i szeroko otworzymy furtki 
 — mówi nam jeden z polityków PSL-Koalicji Polskiej, zwracając uwagę, że sojusz ludowców i Kukiz‘15 przyciągnął w ostatnich miesiącach - na podobnej zasadzie dynamiki politycznej - kilkoro parlamentarzystów kojarzonych dotychczas z Platformą Obywatelską. 
 Ludowcy wiedzą jednak, że zupełnie inne wnioski trzeba będzie przyjąć po zwycięstwie Andrzeja Dudy. 
 Zaczną się podchody na całego. Krucha większość w Senacie stanie pod dużym znakiem zapytania, a i koalicje z ludowcami w sejmikach wojewódzkich będą szturmowane przez polityków PiS 
 — dodaje polityk PSL. 
 Potwierdzają to przedstawiciele PiS w Senacie, którzy są absolutnie pewni tego, że jeśli przed senatorami PSL czy KO stanie alternatywa do frustrującej pracy w ławach opozycyjnych przez kolejne lata. 
 REKLAMA 
 Tuż po wyborach, przy formowaniu większości w Senacie, o transfery było trudno. Emocje olbrzymie, elektorat nie darowałby jednemu czy drugiemu senatorowi. Teraz jest inaczej, a po ewentualnej wygranej prezydenta Dudy będzie jeszcze inaczej, czas będzie działał na naszą korzyść. Jak tylko uznamy, że marszałek Grodzki nie może liczyć na 51 głosów… Cóż, zacznie się gra 
 — słyszymy w Senacie. 
 Krótko mówiąc - PiS może złapać solidny wiatr w żagle, który przełoży się na bardzo namacalne i realne konkrety. Aby tak się jednak stało PiS - a w zasadzie Andrzej Duda - musi utrzymać wyraźną przewagę nad innymi ugrupowaniami i kandydatami w Polsce powiatowej. Wszędzie: od Platformy, przez PSL i Lewicę, na PiS kończąc, przekonani są o kluczowym znaczeniu decyzji Polek i Polaków z terenów poza dużymi miastami. 
 Ciekawie pisał o tym Michał Kolanko, zwracając uwagę na wciąż duże poparcie dla PiS i oczywiście prezydenta Dudy w mniejszych miejscowościach. Dla tych wyborców nie ma dziś realnej, prawdziwej alternatywy od głosowania na Andrzeja Dudę i PiS. Pokazały to kolejne wyniki w ostatnim maratonie wyborczym (choć pole dotyczące mobilizacji ściany wschodniej jest jeszcze dużo większe), ale widać to także po spotkaniach głowy państwa w terenie, a przede wszystkim - słychać w rozmowach z Polakami na co dzień. 
 Jedynym ruchem innym niż PiS jest dla wielu mieszkańców Polski powiatowej zastanowienie się nad wyborem PSL i jego kandydata. O ile w wyborach samorządowych to dość często pojawiające się schematy działania, o tyle przy eurowyborach było zupełnie inaczej (PSL na listach Koalicji Europejskiej), a parlamentarne pozostały nierozstrzygnięte w tej materii - wynik ludowców był mocno „napompowany” działaczami K‘15 i wyborcami z miast, co dotychczas nie miało miejsca. Na wsiach i w miasteczkach mocno górowało PiS. Rywalizację widać symbolicznie na takich zdjęciach jak to poniżej. 
 . / autor: . 
 Jeden z polityków PSL nie kryje tego, że wśród wyborców ludowców naturalnym wyborem jest również głosowanie na PiS, i o to idzie dziś bój: 
 Na moje oko i wyczucie to nawet 70-75 procent wyborców PSL jest w stanie zagłosować na PiS, nie mówiąc o Andrzeju Dudzie, który nie jest zupełnie sklejony z partią. Tak, znam badania, które mówią o tym, że wyborcy PSL w 60% wsparliby w II turze Kidawę-Błońską, ale znając Polskę powiatową - nie wierzę w to. Tam po prostu gardzi się Platformą i jej ludźmi, ludzie zgrzytali zębami nawet na nas, gdy byliśmy z nimi koalicji - ratowały nas tylko pieniądze i konkrety, jakie załatwialiśmy 
 — słyszymy od parlamentarzysty z koniczynką i wpinką „Kosiniak” w klapie marynarki. 
 Inny z ludowców dodaje: 
 70 procent wyborców PSL waha się czy zagłosować na PiS? Pełna zgoda. Dodam, że nawet wśród działaczy PSL poparcie dla Kosiniaka-Kamysza nie jest takie pewne i oczywiste, jak mogłoby się wydawać. Wybory samorządowe czy parlamentarne to zupełnie inna broszka, nie mam poczucia, że lud PSL będzie umierał za Władka 
 — słyszymy. 
 Przebicie się kandydatury Władysława Kosiniaka-Kamysza w Polsce powiatowej będzie kluczowe do odebrania Andrzejowi Dudzie możliwości wygranej już w I turze, a później - jeśli dojdzie do dogrywki 24 maja - to właśnie ci wyborcy mogą decydować o tym, kto zostanie prezydentem. I także dlatego relacje na linii PiS-PSL nie są dziś tak kiepskie jak jeszcze rok temu. Ot, mądrość etapu. 
 ZOBACZ NOWY ODCINEK MAGAZYNU BEZ SPINY:
text2: Let's hold a referendum on civil unions. If I become president, I will fight for the reform of the judiciary - these are your words. Do you want to reform the courts too? Chaos in the judiciary is deepening. President Duda's decision on the muzzle act means that the politicization of the judiciary is as it was in the People's Republic of Poland. In addition, the president's enthusiasm for signing this law was enormous. It seems to me that Andrzej Duda believed that the Minister of Justice Zbigniew Ziobro is trying to reform the judiciary, and in fact he only wants to introduce himself. And real reform is urgently needed, and it cannot be just a return to the past. The first point is to stop the chaos, then introduce justices of the peace - this will speed up the proceedings, reduce court costs, and in itself enough determination to win. Besides, unlike Andrzej Duda and Małgorzata Kidawa-Błońska, I am an independent politician. No chairman or chairman has appointed me

text1: India vs New Zealand | Seven Defeats Out of Eight - New Zealand’s Super Over Misfortunes New Zealand for the second time in as many games squandered a winning position against India and allowed the Super Over miseries to pile on in Wellington after their earlier loss in Hamilton. Here’s a look back at New Zealand’s tryst with Super Overs. Till date they’ve only won once and that was against Australia. West Indies vs New Zealand in Auckland (2008) The big hitting Chris Gayle was in town and after both sides had tied on 155. The southpaw clobbered Daniel Vettori for 25 runs as he played out the full over. Jacob Oram and Ross Taylor had their task cut out but Suleimann Benn picked two wickets as New Zealand could only manage 15. New Zealand vs Australia in Christchurch (2010) 428 runs were scored in 40 overs as Australia and New Zealand Munro managed 13 runs in six balls and India got there effortlessly. KL Rahul smashed 10 runs off the first two balls before he was caught. Then, a fired-up Virat Kohli and Sanju Samson finished the game in style
text2: New Zealand's Super Over heartbreaks Ian Smith might as well author a book on New Zealand's tryst with Super Overs. Kane Williamson's men have featured in three Super Overs in the last year including the historic 2019 World Cup final. On each occasion New Zealand have lost, the last two coming in T20I series at home against England and India. So imagine the state of Smith's heart, having commentated on each of the games, including the close finish in Hamilton on Wednesday. For those whose nerves are too frayed to relive the finishes all over again, ESPNcricinfo has spared you the gory details and put together handy summaries instead. January 29 2020, Hamilton, v India To begin with India did not even know there would be a Super Over. Defending nine off the final over in regulation time, Mohammed Shami started it watching Ross Taylor bludgeon a full running back at cover. Guptill could then only run a single against a perfect yorker, as Jordan wrapped up the match with another dot ball. July 14 2019, Lord's, v England You haven't really forgotten how this one played out have you

text1: phpBB • Upgrading from version 3.0.2 Post by Lumpy Burgertushie » Tue Dec 31, 2019 4:19 am Update phpbb 3.0 to latest 3.0 version Backup up your board's files and database Go here and download the latest 3.0 version of phpbb3.0.14 Full Package Unzip it to your computer. Upload the included folder named "install" into your forum's directory . Browse to yourdomain.com/yourphpbb/install/database_update.php and keep clicking the continue button until it says it is finished. This will take a long time on a large board, maybe hours. Dont give up. Delete the folder named /install/ Hold one foot in the air and spin around in a circle three times saying "I am a phpbb guru". Make a new database backup. Upgrading from phpbb 3.0.x to phpbb 3.1.x things exactly and in order you will be fine.don't forget to make the database backups before starting and after each upgrade.that way, if it crashed on you you can just restore the last database backup and move on from there.good luck,rober
text2:
The magic of the perfect surf photo – in pictures
The three critical elements to surf photography are good light, good surfers and good waves. Most of us photographers get up early to take advantage of all three. Because the ocean is a fickle environment, our window to capture these moments may only come once a month. We study wind and wave charts like meteorologists. We factor in family and jobs, dropping responsibilities more than we should when conditions are right.



When all the elements align, when you’ve made it out there, swum in a turbulent ocean for hours and got home to see an incredible photo, your stoke is off the charts.

The surfers are often strangers who become friends, names and numbers exchanged, meetups discussed and planned shoots coordinated. The photos below, by several photographers, were selected for such a meetup – an evening in southern California last November with several surf photographers to share work of the past year

text1: Il massimo ufficiale militare di Taiwan scomparso dopo che l'elicottero ha effettuato un atterraggio di emergenza Il generale dell'aeronautica di Taiwan Shen Yi-ming (AP Photo) Il massimo ufficiale militare di Taiwan era tra le tre persone scomparse giovedì dopo che un elicottero ha effettuato un atterraggio di emergenza in una zona montuosa settentrionale vicino alla capitale Taipei, ha detto il ministero della Difesa. In una dichiarazione, il ministero ha affermato di aver inviato una squadra per salvare le 13 persone a bordo dell'elicottero Black Hawk, che includeva il capo di stato maggiore di Taiwan, il generale dell'aeronautica Shen Yi-ming, e diversi sopravvissuti erano stati trovati. "Alcuni membri dell'equipaggio sono ancora intrappolati all'interno, mentre altri sono usciti", ha detto un portavoce militare in una conferenza stampa trasmessa in diretta televisiva, anche se ulteriori dettagli non sarebbero disponibili fino a quando le truppe non avranno raggiunto l'area dell'incidente. L'elicottero ha effettuato l'atterraggio di emergenza a New Taipei City dopo che le autorità aeronautiche hanno perso il contatto con esso alle 8, che afferma che Taiwan come suo territorio da portare sotto il controllo di Pechino con la forza se necessario, chiama regolarmente l'isola la questione più delicata nei suoi legami con il Stati Uniti. Taiwan afferma di essere un paese indipendente chiamato Repubblica di Cina, il suo nome ufficiale
text2:
Alto funzionario militare di Taiwan scomparso dopo che l'elicottero ha effettuato un atterraggio di emergenza
Il generale dell'aeronautica Shen Yi-ming. (Fonte: Wikiepedia) Il generale dell'aeronautica Shen Yi-ming. (Fonte: Wikipedia)

L'alto funzionario militare di Taiwan è scomparso dopo che un elicottero ha effettuato un atterraggio di emergenza nel nord di Taiwan, ha detto giovedì il ministero della Difesa dell'isola.

Il ministero della Difesa ha affermato che è in corso una missione di salvataggio per le 13 persone a bordo dell'elicottero Black Hawk, che include il generale dell'aeronautica Shen Yi-ming, capo di stato maggiore dell'isola.

Lì mancavano ancora persone, incluso Shen, mentre diverse persone sono state trovate vive, ha detto il ministero, aggiungendo che una squadra è stata inviata per la missione di salvataggio.

L'incidente è avvenuto una settimana prima delle elezioni chiave dell'11 gennaio, quando l'isola democratica terrà le elezioni presidenziali e parlamentari.

Per tutte le ultime notizie dal mondo, scarica l'app Indian Express

text1: 信：Shaheen 正在为工薪家庭而战 我写信是为了感谢参议员 Jeanne Shaheen 听取了父母和倡导者对高成本和可用许可托儿所短缺的担忧。在听到这些担忧后，参议员 Shaheen 已成为《儿童保育劳动力和设施法》的共同发起人，让父母和其他看护人更接近不必在工作和儿童保育之间做出选择。新罕布什尔州的平均托儿费用令人震惊——通常高于州内大学学费的年度费用。这些成本，加上可用的许可托儿所的短缺，令人震惊和不可接受。如果没有足够的托儿服务，父母不得不在离开劳动力市场（这对当地经济造成重大损失）和寻找无照托儿服务之间做出选择，这可能会对孩子的劳动力产生负面影响，从而促进当地经济发展。我感谢参议员沙欣对两党解决方案的热切承诺，以及对新罕布什尔州工薪家庭和儿童的大力支持。芭芭拉·南布拉德福
text2: 专家感叹治疗肾脏疾病的高昂费用 Dayo Ojerinde 拉各斯州立大学医学院的肾病顾问医生 Olugbenga Awobusuyi 教授说，许多患有肾脏相关疾病的人因为无法为透析和肾移植筹集资金而死亡. Awobusuyi 在圣雷米基金会肾脏护理信托基金组织的筹款活动中指出，发达国家将其年度医疗保健预算的 2% 至 3% 用于治疗终末期肾病。 “过早死亡会给这些患者的家属带来重大经济损失。管理此类疾病的成本也很高。用透析或移植治疗终末期肾病通常会导致灾难性的支出，这会剥夺版权 PUNCH。版权所有。未经 PUNCH 事先明确书面许可，不得复制、出版、广播、重写或重新分发本网站上的本材料和其他数字内容的全部或部分内容。联系方式：[电子邮件保护

text1: 1 ayda 1 milyon lira soygun yapanlar suçüstü yakalandılık  03.01.2020 12:45 | Son Güncelleme: 03.01.2020 12: 50 50: Anadolu tarafındaki Anadolu tarafının 50 puanları, 1 ay boyunca buldukları boş evlere giren 4 akraba, 1 milyon liraya değer değerli eşyaları çaldı. En son kartalda bir binaya giren çete polis tarafından ele geçirildi. Ağabey. (29), Muhammed Ç. (16), Gönül B. (12) ve Selçuk G. (32), son 1 ayda son 1 milyon lirada son 1 milyon lirada akrabaların kurulduğu öğrenildi. Çalıntı araçtan gelen hırsızlar dairelerin önündeydi ve karısı tüm dairelerin kapısını çalıyordu. İç olmayan evler, kadının çantasında sakladığı suç aletleri ile kaçıyor ve değerli eşyaları yönetiyorlardı. Takımlar, hırsızların, girdikleri binaların yakınındaki güvenlik kameralarından so . Yakalanan şahıslar tarafından sorgulanmak üzere olan Gayrettepe'de bulunan İstanbul Asayiş Şube Müdürlüğüne götürüldü. Şahısların tamamlanmasının ardından yargılanmak üzere sorgulanmak üzere adliyeye edildi. - İSTANBUL Kaynak: İHA
text2: Parkta evlilikki eşine şiddet uygulamakan adam öldürülmüş Cumhuriyet Cumhuriyeti Cumhuriyeti Cumhuriyeti'nin teklifinin yazılı açıklamasında, E.E. aynı günde gözaltına alındı ve bugün tutuklandı.Mağdurun beyanı ve yargı raporu, parka maruz kaldıklarında parkta fiziksel şiddete maruz kalan Cumhuriyet Savcılığı Savcısı tarafından alınmıştır.Ee gözaltına alındı.07.06.2020 tarihinde, EE, daha sonra daha sonra daha sonra daha sonra daha sonra Savcılığımızın savcılığının savcılığındaki eylemlere gönderildiği İstanbul Anadolu Sentry Sulh Hakemleri'ne daha sonra daha sonra daha sonra daha sonra olduğu konusunda güçlü bir şüpheye sahip olan EE'nin hapishanesine gönderildi.* Sorgulama kapsamında, her yönüyle ortaya çıkarmak ve sorumlu olan yasal gereklilikle konuşmak için gereken tüm süreçler titizlikle yapılır.Halka açık ve tüm basın / yayın organizasyonları açıktır. text1: Alles Wichtige zur Fahrpreissenkung bei der Deutschen Bahn  Langstrecken-Verkehrsstifte sind billiger. Aufgrund der niedrigeren Mehrwertsteuer gilt für diese Tickets eine geringere Mehrwertsteuer. Aber eignen sich aber: Wer ist zu früh, verfehlt den Vorteil. Welche Verbraucher wissen müssen. Jahr-jährliche Verbraucher schimpften ständig teurere Tickets der Deutschen Bahn. Aber im kommenden Jahr ist alles anders: Am 1. Januar reduziert der Konzern die Preise im Fernverkehr um zehn Prozent. Somit betritt die Eisenbahn eine niedrigere MwSt, die von der Bundesregierung vollständig den Kunden entschieden wird. Auf diese Weise reisen mehr Menschen mit dem Zug und klettern das Klima. Für die Verbraucher gibt es viel zu beachten. Was sind deine Tickets billiger? Die Tarifverringerung betrifft alle Reisen im Fernverkehr. Sie beziehen sich nicht nur auf die gewöhnlichen Tickets, sondern auch auf Sparpreise und zusätzlich  Das Unternehmen sieht sich vor allem auf den Nebenstrecken bedroht, wo die Sparpreise der Bahn möglicherweise mit denen des Bus-Unternehmens mithalten können. Flixbus hat deshalb angekündigt, gegen die Mehrwertsteuer-Senkung zu klagen.
text2: Söder: Politik in Deutschland muss qualitativ besser werden  Die Politiker müssen mehr denn je zu einer Level-Up-Debattenkultur zahlen, um ihre Ziele aus der Sicht des CSU BOSS Markus Söder durchzusetzen. "Ich bin die feste Überzeugung, die Politik muss heute besser qualitativ besser sein", sagte der Premierminister der deutschen Presseagentur Bayerns in München. Deutschland ist ein Land mit einer qualitativ hochwertigen Wissenschaft und Wirtschaft, Kunst und Gesellschaft. "Die Politik muss daher qualitativer Betonung diskutieren. Moderne Führung bedeutet, ohne zu stehend zu bleiben. Es ist viel anspruchsvoller als zuvor geworden." Mit Blick auf die Stabilisierungsrolle der CSU der CSU des CSU von Söder betonte er, dass die Partei auch die Partei unter seiner Führung betonte, die nicht Ihre unvorhersehbare nicht gepflegte Unberechenbarkeit seit Jahrzehnten verlieren: "Die Stabilität ist nicht im Sinn. Stabilität bedeutet nicht, nur um das andere Recht z  in die Rolle des anderen hinein versetzen können. Karte zum Artikel CSU-Zentrale, Mies-van-der-Rohe-Straße 1 München, Deutschland CSU-Zentrale, Mies-van-der-Rohe-Straße 1 München, Deutschland

text1: Вот почему вам не следует стирать белье в Новый год Подпишитесь на БЕСПЛАТНЫЕ ежедневные оповещения по электронной почте от Devonlive - отчет о выходных Подпишитесь Спасибо за подписку См. наше уведомление о конфиденциальности Не удалось подписаться, повторите попытку позже Неверный адрес электронной почты Мы все слышали об этом не повезло оставить свои украшения после Двенадцатой ночи, но как насчет стирки? Что ж, кажется, есть несколько суеверий, связанных со стиркой в Новый год, и ни одно из них не является хорошим. На самом деле, если верить таким суевериям, стирка 1 января смоет любую удачу на следующий год. Некоторые считают, что член семьи может быть смыт водой или умереть в течение года, сообщает Manchester Evening News. Неизвестно, откуда взялось это странное суеверие, но, похоже, многие люди его соблюдают. Некоторые говорят, что любое благополучие, которое есть в доме, остается внутри. В то время как многие суеверия связаны с едой, свинина считается удачей, поскольку свиньи добывают себе пищу, а лобстеры или крабы, по-видимому, приносят несчастье, поскольку они движутся боком.
text2: Полиция Рок-Хилла расследует тройную стрельбу в новогоднюю ночь РОК-ХИЛЛ, Южная Каролина — Полиция Рок-Хилла расследует стрельбу, в результате которой три человека попали в больницу вскоре после полуночи в день Нового года. Стрельба произошла около 00:22 1 января. Три жертвы были застрелены в доме на Букер-Вашингтон-стрит. Полиция заявляет, что расследует преступление как покушение на убийство, но не обнародовала информацию о возможном подозреваемом или мотиве. Сообщения о стрельбе поступили около 12 часов. 22:00 в доме на Букер-Вашингтон-стрит. По прибытии полиция сообщает, что они обнаружили 64-летнего мужчину с огнестрельным ранением в грудь, 42-летнюю женщину с огнестрельным ранением в живот и 53-летнего мужчину с огнестрельным ранением в грудь. плечо.   Все пострадавшие доставлены в больницу, травмы несовместимы с жизнью. Полиция Рок-Хилла сообщает, что они все еще расследуют причины стрельбы и не обнародовали никакой информации о возможных подозреваемых. Детективы говорят, что инцидент, похоже, был единичным в это время.

text1: El jefe de policía de Phnom Penh insta a sus agentes a frenar los delitos El jefe de policía de Phnom Penh insta a sus agentes a frenar los delitos El jefe de policía de Phnom Penh, el teniente general Sar Thet, ha pedido a sus agentes de policía que hagan todo lo posible para acabar con los delitos en toda la capital a pesar de las caídas en cifras. Hablando en una ceremonia de promoción en Phnom Penh el lunes, el teniente general Thet dijo que los casos penales disminuyeron en 2019 gracias a los esfuerzos concertados para tomar medidas enérgicas contra los delitos. “Según el informe de 2019, los delitos graves se han reducido a 31 casos y los casos de delitos menores se han reducido a 177 casos”, dijo el teniente general Thet. Dijo que los policías deben velar por el cumplimiento de la ley, la seguridad y el orden público del pueblo. “Nuestros oficiales de policía deben trabajar más duro para tomar medidas enérgicas contra los delitos para que disminuyan”, dijo Eng. San Chey, director ejecutivo de Affiliated Network for Social Accountability, se hizo eco de las preocupaciones de Kim Eng. “Aunque los delitos penales han disminuido, la gente todavía se preocupa por los problemas de drogas, especialmente los juegos de azar”, dijo.
text2: Autista di camion accusato di DWI dopo aver colpito a morte un pedone alla vigilia di Capodanno Martedì un camionista è stato arrestato per aver colpito a morte un pedone a East Harlem. Un portavoce della polizia ha detto che l'incidente è avvenuto intorno alle 17:00. la vigilia di Capodanno all'incrocio tra E. 125 Street e Madison Avenue. Un autista di un camion Safelite, identificato come Farkell Hopkins, stava guidando in direzione est sulla 125th Street quando ha colpito il pedone, che stava tentando di attraversare la strada a metà isolato. Farkell, che è rimasto sulla scena, è stato accusato di omicidio stradale e guida in stato di ebbrezza. Il Daily News ha notato che la vittima, ritenuta sulla quarantina, non aveva un documento d'identità e la polizia sta ancora lavorando per identificarlo. Statistiche del Dipartimento dei trasporti a partire da lunedì scorso anche a lunedì, da 115 in tutto il 2018. Ventinove ciclisti sono morti, quasi il triplo delle vittime dell'anno scorso. Abbiamo contattato il DOT per ottenere il conteggio finale delle vittime dei pedoni nel 2019

text1: Władimir i spor o Put. Rosja chce Miejscową Polskę  Vladimir Putin i spór historii. Rosja chce, aby rezolucja potępiająca Polskę, która chce przedstawić projekt rezolucji potępiającą Polskę w Europie za "próba sfałszowania prawdy historycznej". Ogłosił tego przewodniczącego Komitetu Spraw Zagranicznych Dumy. Jest to kolejna edycja sporu dotyczące przyczyn wybuchu II wojny światowej. Proszę Głosuj. Podziel się opiniami Reviewymir Putin i sporu o historię. Rosja chce rezolucji potępiającą Polskę (PAP / EPA, fot. Leonid Słucki stwierdził, że rosyjskie dyplomaty starali się przekonać delegatów w Radzie Europy, że Warszawa "próbuje usłyszeć historyczną prawdę". Projekt uchwały potępiający Polskę zostanie złożony tylko wtedy, gdy Rosja będzie pewna, że zostanie on din stwierdził nawet, że zgłoszone koszty przeniesienia na „obozy zagłady”. Parlamentarzyściści deklarują się w tej sprawie i gotowość do zmian kredytowych, przez "fałszowania historii wielkiej Wojny Ojczyźnianej".
text2: Rosja złoży w Radzie Europy projektowej strony internetowej Przewodniczący Komitetu Spraw Zagranicznych Rosyjskiej Duma Leonid Słucki ogłosił w wywiadzie z TASS, że projekt potwierdził Polskę wkrótce zostanie złożony do Zgromadzenia Parlamentarnego Rady Europy. Sprawa dotyczy przyczyn wybuchu II wojny światowej.Usługi twierdzi, że zadanie rosyjskich polityków jest "spójne przeniesienie prawdy" o tym, co dzieje się w WarszawieRosyjski polityk w ten sposób odnoszący się do działań Polskiego Parlamentu, który kilka dni temu przez Acclamation przyjęła rezolucję potępiającą skandaliczne oświadczenie o najwyższych władz rosyjskich.  i jakie są decyzje – stwierdził szef. Wypoczywaj, polityk w ten sposób, w jaki sposób odnieść się do polskiego banku, który ma kroki w postępie dni temu.

text1: Nach zehn Minuten war der Bundesanwalt wieder draussen – Laubers Kurzauftritt vor der Geschäftsprüfungskommission Am Mittwoch um 13.29 Uhr erschien Michael Lauber, Bundesanwalt, aus einem Seiteneingang kommend, unten in der grossen Eingangshalle im Bundeshaus. Bei den Drei Eidgenossen bog er ab und stieg die Treppe in Richtung Nationalratssaal hoch und verschwand im Saal, in dem die Geschäftsprüfungskommissionen (GPK) von National- und Ständerat tagten. Unterwegs grüsste er den Journalisten freundlich, wenn auch mit einem etwas gequälten Lächeln. Rund zehn Minuten später, um 13.41 Uhr, war Laubers Auftritt vor dem Parlament schon wieder vorbei. Die Mission war offensichtlich nicht erfolgreich. Beim Verlassen des Nationalratssaals wirkte er enerviert, er fuchtelte mit einer Hand und redete, seine schwarze Mappe in der anderen,liches Amtsverständnis stösst auf wenig Verständnis. Der AB-BA unter dem früheren Zuger Regierungsrat Hanspeter Uster, der die Aufsichtsschraube gegenüber Lauber anzog, wird ein über alles gesehen gutes Zeugnis ausgestellt
text2: Laubers Sitz wackelt: Gerichtskommission macht ersten Schritt zu Amtsenthebungs-Verfahren Möglichst dann soll auch der Entscheid fallen, ob tatsächlich ein Amtsenthebungsverfahren eingeleitet wird. Dies sagte der Kommissionspräsident, FDP-Ständerat Andrea Caroni (FDP, AR), gestern Abend vor den Medien. Es wäre das erste Amtsenthebungsverfahren in der Geschichte des modernen Bundesstaates. Es ist ein Datum, das wohl auch Michael Lauber nicht so schnell vergessen wird. Gestern Mittwoch hat die Gerichtskommission der vereinigten Bundesversammlung einen ersten Schritt hin zu einem Amtsenthebungsverfahren gegen den Bundesanwalt gemacht. Bevor jedoch entschieden wird, ob ein solches tatsächlich eingeleitet wird, hat Lauber das Recht, vor der 17-köpfigen Parlamentskommission seine Sicht der Dinge darzulegen. Dazu hat ihn die Kommission für kommenden Dienstag aufgeboten. Die Zahl der Vorwürfe Er sei froh, wie sachlich die Kommission gestern gearbeitet habe. $Noch im Herbst war Lauber – gegen den Willen der Gerichtskommission – vom Parlament knapp wiedergewählt worden. Er erhielt vor allem Support aus SVP, FDP und SP

text1: ATLAS Mara Limited 宣布拟议交易更新和年度股东大会通知（MENAFN - ACCESSWIRE）关于拟议交易和年度股东大会的更新 TORTOLA / ACCESSWIRE / 2020 年 1 月 2 日 / Atlas Mara Limited（“Atlas Mara”或“公司”）于 30 日宣布2019 年 4 月，它已签订具有约束力的条款清单，据此，Atlas Mara 同意将四个国家的某些银行资产交换为 Equity Group Holdings Plc（“EGH”）的股份。 2019 年 9 月 30 日，Atlas Mara 指出确认性尽职调查已基本结束。截至本公告日，各方尚未签署详细的交易协议。虽然无法保证潜在交易将按照先前宣布的条款完成，但双方将继续进行讨论，可能适用与使用和分发此信息相关的条件。如需更多信息，请联系 [电子邮件保护] 或访问 www.rns.com。来源：阿特拉斯玛拉有限公司 MENAFN0201202000703708ID109949713
text2: Echuca 需要的银行不是它可以保持在线的银行，电话银行被指责为 Echuca 澳大利亚银行分行的缓慢衰退，该分行将于 4 月 3 日关闭。Hare St 分行已被命名为该地区的地点之一澳大利亚银行副首席执行官约翰·亚德利（John Yardley）将其归因于银行业不断变化的性质。当地分行是维多利亚州四家即将关闭的分行之一，但 Yardley 先生表示，当地客户仍然可以通过网上或电话进行银行业务。 “在过去六个月对我们在全国分行网络的运营进行彻底审查后，我们做出了关闭 Echuca 分行的艰难决定，”他说。 “我们为 Echuca 社区服务的历史悠久，我们致力于确保我们反映随着越来越多的客户选择在线银行业务而不断变化的银行业性质。”将于 2020 年初举行信息发布会，让客户与银行高级代表会面，讨论分行关闭及其银行业务需求

text1: 我们是开放的：托德菲利普斯在“小丑”续集电影制片人托德菲利普斯说，如果一个理想的机会出现，他会进一步探索标志性的 DC 反派小丑。菲利普斯最近执导了《小丑》，其中华金·菲尼克斯饰演犯罪小丑。这部电影获得了评论家的压倒性评价，票房大获成功，全球票房收入超过 10 亿美元。从那以后，导演一直面临有关这部电影潜在续集的问题。菲利普斯在截止日期的纽约竞争者颁奖季活动中表示，他“愿意”与菲尼克斯重聚，但目前还没有最终确定。 “当一部电影的制作成本为 10 亿美元，制作成本为 6000 万美元时，当然会出现。但华金和我还没有真正决定。我们是开放的。“我的意思是，我会制作这个电影为我们工作，所以我们必须有一些具有同等主题共鸣的东西，”他补充说。（这个故事没有由商业标准工作人员编辑，是从联合提要自动生成的。

text1: Multan a hijo de payaso "Chimbombín" en Comalapa cuando ambos iban a "ganarse los frijolitos" El hijo de Douglas Hernández Fajardo, conocido artísticamente como el payaso "Chimbombín", fue multado este miércoles por la mañana, tras ser detenido en un retén policial y detectarle que manejaba sin licencia de conducir el vehículo en el que se transportaba junto con su padre. El hecho sucedió frente al monumento Cristo de La Paz, en la carretera a Comalapa. El retén se encontraba ubicado sobre el carril que conduce hacia el Aeropuerto Internacional Monseñor Romero, como parte de los planes de control policial que habitualmente se instalan esa carretera en días festivos. Cuando fue detenido, al hijo de "Chimbombín" se le impuso una multa económica de $ 57.14, ya que no pudo presentar la licencia en vista de que solo le el payaso Chimbombín sobre la sanción impuesta a su hijo. Video LPG / V. Cea. pic.twitter.com/sgJP5Nv7kt — La Prensa Gráfica (@prensagrafica) January 1, 202
text2: Policía multa al hijo del payaso Chimbombín por manejar sin licencia en la carretera a Comalapa El padre intercedió para que su hijo no fuera multado. Sin embargo, las autoridades siempre lo pusieron una infracción de $57.14. Por C.Fuentes Ene 01, 2020- 15:30 El hijo del payaso Chimbombín, que aún no ha sido identificado, fue uno de los primeros conductores en ser multados en el inicio de 2020 por infringir la Ley de Transporte Terrestre, Tránsito y Seguridad Vial. Fue sorprendido durante un control vehicular que la Policía de Tránsito instaló sobre el kilómetro 8 de la carretera a Comalapa. Chimbombín, que acompañaba a su hijo en el momento en que fueron detenidos, explicó que se dirigían a trabajar y por el cansancio y que había pedido a su hijo que le ayudara a conduc navidad y año nuevo, se realizaron 610 controles vehiculares en los que se aplicaron un total de 7,027 pruebas de alcoholemia a automovilistas. Aproximadamente hubo 113 detenidos por conducción peligrosa a nivel nacional

text1: Marakkar Arabikadalinte Simham Cannot Be Compared With Baahubali: Mohanlal Mohanlal, the complete actor is all set to release his ambitious project Marakkar Arabikadalinte Simham, very soon. Recently, the senior actor opened up about the comparisons between Marakkar Arabikadalinte Simham and Baahubali, the Prabhas starring Telugu blockbuster. Mohanlal suggested that the Priyadarshan directorial cannot be compared with the SS Rajamouli directorial. According to the complete actor, Baahubali is an out-and-out fantasy film that reminds us of the old Amar Chitra Kadha comics. When it comes to the SS Rajamouli directorial, the makers had the creative liberty to showcase anything they think fits the bill due to its fantasy element. It was clearly a great advantage. Marakkar Arabikadalinte Simham, on the other hand, is an Mohanlal starrer suggests that something very special is in store for the Malayalam cinema audiences. Marakkar Arabikadalinte Simham, which might hit the theatres in April 2020, is expected to break all the pre-existing collection records of the Malayalam cinema
text2: Marakkar Arabikadalinte Simham Official Trailer To Be Released On This Date! Marakkar Arabikadalinte Simham, the upcoming Mohanlal starring historical drama is unarguably one of the most anticipated upcoming films of the Malayalam film industry in 2020. The Priyadarshan directorial is all set to have a grand release on March 26, Thursday. Recently, the makers revealed the release date of Marakkar Arabikadalinte Simham official trailer. The trailer release date was revealed through the official social media pages of lead actor Mohanlal, director Priyadarshan, and the rest of the team members recently. Marakkar Arabikadalinte Simham official trailer will be jointly released by Mohanlal and Bollywood actor Akshay Kumar through their respective social media pages on March 6, 2020, at 5 PM. According to the sources close to the project, the official trailer of Marakkar Arabikadalinte Simham will provide a photography of Marakkar Arabikadalinte Simham. Sabu Cyril, the National Award-winning art director has handled the production design. Renowned stunt director Peter Hein has designed the action sequences for the Mohanlal-Priyadarshan project

text1: Six smart money management moves for 2020 Money is important. And the start of a new year is generally a good time to make some solid resolutions to manage your finances. While you need not take any giant leaps, you must start with some simple steps to manage your money well. Here are six simple measures. Continue to invest systematically Markets have been volatile. In 2019, the S&P BSE Sensex delivered around 14 percent, but the BSE Midcap index lost two percent and the BSE Small Cap index fell six percent. In fact, just 15 of the Sensex’s 30 stocks contributed meaningfully; the rest of the companies’ shares gave mediocre returns or lost money in 2019. These are slim pickings and, quite naturally, our fund managers have been facing challenging times. But here’s some good news. text2: My 2019 in AsiaOne: I found out what makes Singaporean men so desirable 2019 is the year of revelations. Self-revelations most of all. For the sake of a few stories, I've had to dive deep into whether I wanted to have more kids (the answer is probably no) and reveal some never-before-spoken-about aspects of my marriage to a foreigner. I've realised it's tough exposing a part of yourself online to thousands, especially for someone who normally keeps things close to my chest. But it's a retrospective and introspective exercise (much like this one) that has its benefits — producing fresh insights, for one. In my case, it made me more appreciative and kinder to the husband. My desire to maintain some online privacy also went out the window when I was asked to contribute some personal content for Instagram. But as with all is the thief of joy?). Other lessons gleaned: just be yourself — somebody, somewhere will love you for it, and simply do more of what makes you happy. Here's to a wonderful 2020 for all. candicecai@asiaone.co

text1: Trump ha attaccato per aver trascorso "1 giorno ogni 5" in una mazza da golf nel 2019 Trump ha giocato nel suo campo a Turnberry in Scozia durante una visita ufficiale nel Regno Unito: Getty Donald Trump è stato criticato dopo che è stato riferito di aver trascorso quasi uno su ogni cinque giorni giocando a golf l'anno scorso, nonostante abbia detto agli elettori che sarebbe stato troppo impegnato a lavorare per tale attività. Anche prima di lanciare la sua offerta per la Casa Bianca, Trump ha spesso criticato Barack Obama per aver giocato al gioco, qualcosa a cui il 44esimo presidente si è riservato quando era in vacanza. "Voglio dire che ha giocato più a golf della maggior parte delle persone nel PGA Tour, questo ragazzo", ha detto Trump durante una campagna nel New Hampshire. “Cos'è, oltre 300 colpi? Ehi, guarda, va bene. Il golf va bene. Ma gioca sempre con i leader dei paesi e le persone che possono aiutarci! Non giocare sempre con i tuoi amici". amministrazione "vietare la maggior parte dei gusti di sigaretta elettronica" Giuliani minaccia di "fare dimostrazioni" al processo per l'impeachment di Trump Il leader supremo dell'Iran attacca Trump su Twitter Trump insiste che Kim Jong-un sia "uomo di parola
text2: Klobuchar Jabs Trump per aver trascorso 1 giorno su 5 nel 2019 in un club di golf: "Ho trascorso 0 giorni sul campo da golf" Il senatore democratico Amy Klobuchar, candidato alla presidenza del 2020, mercoledì ha chiamato il presidente Donald Trump dopo che un rapporto ha scoperto che aveva trascorso uno dei cinque giorni nel 2019 in un golf club. Un rapporto, pubblicato dalla CNN il giorno di Capodanno, ha rilevato che Trump, che ha concluso il 2019 con un periodo al Trump International Golf Club di West Palm Beach, aveva trascorso più di 252 giorni in una delle sue mazze da golf e 333 in una delle sue proprietà da quando è stato inaugurato nel gennaio 2017. Solo lo scorso anno, il presidente è stato in un club di golf per almeno 86 giorni. In risposta, Klobuchar ha condiviso l'articolo e ha detto: "Per la cronaca, ho trascorso 0 giorni sul campo da golf nel 2019". Per la cronaca, ho trascorso 0 giorni sul campo da golf nel 2019. — Amy Klobuchar (@amy Democratic 2020 field, con il 4% di supporto. text1: Why Evangelicals May Be Hardwired to Believe Trump's Falsehoods President Donald Trump lies so often that it is no longer shocking when it happens. Many psychologists have pointed out that he is constantly gaslighting his base—a term that refers to a strategic attempt to get others to question their direct experience of reality. Most of his fervent supporters are convinced that Trump is the harbinger of truth when it comes to important issues like climate change—which he has said is a “hoax perpetrated by the Chinese government.” This has contributed to fake news and propaganda. Given its negative impact on society, it is important to understand why certain groups of people are more vulnerable to believing unsupported lies than others. The fields of psychology and neuroscience can offer insight. One reason Trump supporters believe him comes from a basic fact about the brain: it takes more mental effort to reject reflected in how we educate our youth. Additionally, we must create an awareness of the fact that for the human mind, believing is more of a reflex than a careful and methodical action. This article was originally published at Raw Story
text2:
LETTER: Donald Trump and evangelicals
President Donald Trump. (AP Photo/Patrick Semansky)

According to recent reports, Christian approval for President Donald Trump has waned, with predictions that Christian voters won’t come out in the 2020 election for Mr. Trump as they did in 2016. Which begs this question: Who will they vote for?

With none of the Democratic presidential hopefuls courting this voting bloc (yet), a definitive answer is unknown. Some (Christians) may not vote or may vote for President Trump regardless. But this is certain: Christians believe that the Almighty works through, not around, whoever is voted into office.

text1: ¿Qué acciones debo comprar en 2020? El contexto político de 2019 realmente puso a prueba los nervios de los inversores y creo que esto continuará a lo largo de 2020. A pesar de un aire de calma (junto con un repunte del precio de las acciones) que desciende sobre los mercados después de las elecciones, creo que esto será de corta duración. . La victoria de los conservadores detuvo la incertidumbre del mercado que lo había estado agobiando, pero a medida que la realidad de un 'Brexit de Boris' se vuelve cada vez más real, creo que las consecuencias para las empresas británicas serán claras. Los temas ambientales, sociales y de gobernanza (ESG) y de sostenibilidad han estado en la mente de los inversores a medida que las crecientes preocupaciones sobre el cambio climático subieron una o dos velocidades en 2019. Furiosos incendios forestales en Australia, reunión de Greta Thunberg con Sir David Attenborough y discurso de apertura de Mark Carney advirtiendo a las grandes empresas que asuman la responsabilidad antes de que se espere que aumenten los precios en 2020. Me gustan estas dos empresas como compras potenciales para 2020, ya que son empresas de larga data con un catálogo de marcas conocidas y el estado FTSE 100. También creo que se mantendrán firmes en la Gran Bretaña posterior al Brexit.
text2:
LeBron James, Lakers ring in 2020 after strong start to season
EL SEGUNDO — To welcome in the next decade, the Lakers shed their purple and gold for a night, opting for black-tie suits instead.

They were all over each other’s social media feeds, dancing and smoking cigars on Monday night as LeBron James celebrated his 35th birthday.

Because the Lakers play the Phoenix Suns on Wednesday night, New Year’s Eve celebrations are expected to be significantly toned down. James said he only decided three days before the big night that he would have a party at all, which his wife Savannah helped assemble on the short turnaround. It wasn’t just a birthday, but a turning of the page on the year as well.

“I was able to kill two birds with one stone, get my teammates there, coaching staff, my family, my friends, people that’s been around for quite a while and we had a heck of a time,” he said. “So it was another opportunity for us to bond, which we did. And if it brings us closer, then fantastic. That’s what it’s all about for me, bringing us closer to family as possible.”

The Lakers ended 2019 pretty tight-knit, with a strong body of work behind them. Leading the Western Conference standings and finishing a challenging December slate at 9-5, some of their hardest work is behind them even though the bulk of the schedule remains.

The year wrapped on an upbeat note with wins over the Portland Trail Blazers and Dallas Mavericks. After that second victory, Coach Frank Vogel had a chance to look at the footage of his team holding the No. 1 offense in the NBA to just 95 points – to his surprise, he saw some opportunities where his defense (104.8 defensive rating, No. 7 in the NBA) could be even better.

That’s the Lakers’ 2019 resolution: They’re still looking for the perfect performance.

“It’s just reason for optimism that we still have a long way to go and a lot of room for improvement,” he said. “It’s exciting what we can be.”

A big part of that has been success against the teams they are supposed to beat: The Lakers are 17-0 against teams under .500 this season. They’ll have an opportunity to extend that perfection with upcoming home games against Phoenix, New Orleans, Detroit and New York.

The Lakers warmed to the challenge of their tough schedule last month, playing a host of teams bound for the playoffs. The concern, Vogel acknowledged, is that over a third of the way in against less-than-stellar competition, complacency can sneak in.

“It’s a different sort of stretch right now,” he said. “I think we begin to enter the dog days of the NBA season, which is like now until All-Star break where it gets a little monotonous and there’s a little bit of a grind and hopefully we can get through that stretch. And then once All-Star break hits, you’re in the home stretch after that.”

One of the factors the Lakers feel is in their favor is chemistry. Multiple players have cited the 1-through-15 chemistry on the roster as a strength, and James’ birthday party was the latest event where the Lakers have largely shown up off the court as a group.

James pointed to his youth league days as a model: When he was a young player, he and his teammates would go to parks or malls and play video games together.

“Not only did it influence the way I play on the court, having an effect on how I play today, it also had an influence of how I grew up with my friends, too, and having that brotherhood,” he said. “If you know anything about my childhood, the guys that I grew up playing ball are still around, they’re still like my best friends.”

The same concept is important to his NBA teams, James said, which is among the reasons everyone was invited. The feeling of the Lakers is that off-court chemistry will help form on-court bonds that can help them in competitive games.

It also leads to some nice post-party texts.

“The best thing about it is that my teammates said how much of a time they had,” he said. “My family and my friends had a heck of a time. Got a lot of messages this morning saying how much fun it was, how much love was in the air. So that’s what makes it cool for me. The people around me had a good time.”

🎥 LeBron: "We ended 2019 in a good position to continue to get better, and play better basketball in January than we did in December.” pic.twitter.com/CZnJC3MsC6 — Los Angeles Lakers (@Lakers) January 1, 2020

text1: Red Bull con deseos de triunfar en F1 con Max Verstappen Por Guillermo Abogado González Milton Keynes, Ing., 1 Ene (Notimex).- En la escudería Red Bull tienen claro el panorama, triunfar en la temporada 2020 de la Fórmula 1 con su piloto estelar, el holandés Max Verstappen, mientras que en el asiento coequipero las dudas siguen. Verstappen, quien ganó tres Grandes Premios en 2019, es la carta fuerte del equipo de Milton Keynes, pero eso no sucede con el tailandés Alexander Albon, quien al menos comenzará como compañero de Max en esta nueva campaña. La incertidumbre en Red Bull aparece debido a que en 2019 confiaron en el francés Pierre Gasly, pero a mitad de campaña lo enviaron a Toro Rosso para subir al propio Albon. Incluso los dos conductores que están en Toro Rosso, Gasly del campeón Lewis Hamilton y del finlandés Valtteri Bottas, así como por delante de los Cavallino Rampante del monegasco Charles Leclerc y el alemán Sebastian Vettel. -Fin de nota- NTX/GAGO/LH
text2: El asiento más caliente de la parrilla en 2020... y Alonso De los veinte pilotos de Fórmula 1 que competirán en 2020, siete son o han sido parte del programa de Red Bull. Están Verstappen, Albon, Gasly y Kvyat, estuvieron Sainz, Ricciardo y Vettel. Son mayoría, un 35%, y eso habla muy bien de la academia más exitosa de la historia del automovilismo. El problema es que no viene nadie por detrás que convenza. Los dos pilotos de Toro Rosso ya pasaron por el primer equipo sin éxito, y tampoco ayudan las prisas de sus jefes, que han gastado demasiadas balas en poco tiempo. Estas y otras circunstancias convertirán al segundo RB16, el que no pertenece a Mad Max, en el asiento más caliente de la temporada 2020. Por lo pronto, será del tailandés Alex Albon, de 23 años, rookie en 2019 que pasado común en McLaren), pero mejor no despejar balones fuera: fuentes de la casa japonesa confirman a AS que la elección de pilotos es exclusiva de Red Bull y Honda no toma parte ni ejerce vetos. Cuidado, que vienen curvas

text1: Ab sofort: Integrierter Rechtsschutz für analoge und digitale Welt  Ab sofort: Integrierter Rechtsschutz für die analoge und digitale Welt Immer mehr Österreicherinnen und Österreicher sind von Online-Betrug, Phishing- und Stalking-Angriffen betroffen. Die neue Rechtsschutzversicherung der Wiener Städtischen bietet jetzt auch Schutz in der digitalen Welt. Wien (OTS) - Ein bisschen Unachtsamkeit oder einfach nur Pech - jeder kann sehr schnell in eine Situation geraten, in der Rechtsbeistand erforderlich ist. Die Reichweite ist enorm: Ob im Alltag, im Straßenverkehr, am Arbeitsplatz oder im Internet – Rechtsberatung oder allfällige Prozesskosten können schnell mehrere Tausend Euro betragen. Gerade im Bereich des Internets steigt der Bedarf an rechtlicher Unterstützung – neue Risiken wie Online-Betrug, Phishing im Online-Banking, Datenschutz, Urheberrecht oder auch Mobbing nehmen seit einigen Jahren stark zu. „Der Bedarf a : c.kreuzer @ wienerstaedtische.at Ralf Maurer Tel.: +43 (0)50 350-21227 E-Mail: r.maurer @ wienerstaedtische.at Die Presseaussendung finden Sie auch unter
text2: I learned how to make authentic Wiener schnitzel at the home of the dish in Vienna, and was shocked by how technical it was Wiener schnitzel is the most iconic dish of Vienna, Austria. Historic restaurant Figlmüller is the best-loved place in the city when it comes to schnitzel, and when I was in Vienna recently I had a cooking lesson from head chef Markus Brunner. I was surprised to find there was a lot more skill involved than I'd expected, and all the details were key to creating such a special dish. Schnitzel is simple but incredibly delicious when done right, however, it's also quite a lot of effort to make at home, so I wish there was a Figlmüller in London. Visit Insider's homepage for more stories. Schnitzel is one of the best-loved symbols of Vienna — and one of Austria's most famous instead, and they still do. On a recent trip to Vienna, I had a private schnitzel-cooking lesson with Figlmüller's head chef to find out exactly how the dish is made, and what's so special about it

text1:
Geburtenbilanz 2019 erneut positiv
Die Geburtenbilanz in Österreich war 2019 erneut positiv. Es gab im vergangenen Jahr um 1.918 mehr Geburten als Sterbefälle. Das berichtete die Statistik Austria am Donnerstag. Im Zusammenspiel von Geburten und Sterbefällen verzeichnete 2019 insbesondere Wien einen starken Geburtenüberschuss.

Die Zahl der Neugeborenen lag im vergangenen Jahr laut vorläufigen Ergebnissen von Statistik Austria bei 84.221. Das entspricht einem Rückgang von 1,5 Prozent im Vergleich zu 2018. Im gleichen Zeitraum verstarben insgesamt 82.303 Personen, zwei Prozent weniger als im Vorjahr. Bezogen auf die Bevölkerung entsprach dies zehn Geburten sowie neun Sterbefällen je 1.000 Einwohner. Diese Daten enthalten auch 465 im Ausland Geborene (0,6 Prozent), deren Mütter in Österreich hauptgemeldet sind, sowie 637 im Ausland verstorbene Personen mit Hauptwohnsitz in Österreich (0,8 Prozent).

Überdurchschnittlich war die Zahl der Geburten bezogen auf die Bevölkerung (Geburtenrate) in Vorarlberg, Wien, Salzburg und in Oberösterreich, während im Burgenland, Kärnten, Niederösterreich und der Steiermark die Zahl der Sterbefälle bezogen auf die Bevölkerung (Sterberate) über dem Österreich-Schnitt lag.

Neben Wien (+4.075) wurden auch in Oberösterreich (+1.422), Vorarlberg (+1.273), Tirol (+1.268) und Salzburg (+1.056) mehr Geburten als Sterbefälle registriert. Weniger Neugeborene als Gestorbene gab es - wie bereits in den Vorjahren - in Niederösterreich (-2.741), der Steiermark (-1.715), in Kärnten (-1.557) und im Burgenland (-1.163).

Quelle: APA
text2:
21e hebdomadaire Autriche - Statistiques du commerce extérieur (31/12/2019)
Commerce extérieur régional : Au premier semestre 2019, sept des neuf Länder autrichiens ont enregistré des augmentations du côté des exportations, selon les résultats préliminaires de Statistics Austria. Les États fédérés Vienne (+7,8%) et Styrie (+7,6%) ont réalisé les plus fortes augmentations relatives. En termes absolus, la Styrie (+0,94 milliard d'euros), Vienne (+0,75 milliard d'euros) et la Haute-Autriche (+0,74 milliard d'euros) ont affiché les gains les plus importants. La Carinthie (-4,3 % ou - 0,17 milliard d'euros) et la Basse-Autriche (-1,8 % ou - 0,21 milliard d'euros) ont enregistré un recul par rapport à la période précédente. Du côté des importations, la Styrie (+6,4 % ou + 0,61 milliard d'euros), la Basse-Autriche (+5,7 % ou + 0,74 milliard d'euros) et le Vorarlberg (+4,2 % ou + 0,16 milliard d'euros) ont enregistré les plus fortes hausses relatives par rapport à la précédente semestre. text1: North Korea's Warning to America: End Your 'Hostile Policy' Or Get Nothing In the most anticipated speech of his career today, North Korea’s Kim Jong-un told hundreds of cadre from the Workers’ Party of Korea to prepare for a long-term standoff with the United States over its drive to “seek its own political and diplomatic interests” in Korea while “wasting time away under the signboard of dialogue and negotiations.” But to the obvious surprise of many U.S. experts, Kim hedged on making any move that would cross a red line for the Trump administration or the Pentagon. Instead, he left the door open for further negotiations over peace and denuclearization – but only if the United States “rolls back its hostile policy towards the DPRK” and helps build “a lasting and durable peace-keeping mechanism” on the peninsula. In some ways, Kim’ spy planes, based primarily in nearby Okinawa and carrying the most sophisticated surveillance equipment in the world, combed Korean skies looking for any signs of new tests that would violate the moratorium. Read the original article
text2: Here’s North Korea’s New Year’s gift to the world We didn’t wind up getting that Christmas present from Kim Jong-un that he promised. (Not even the vase that President Trump suggested.) While most of us were expecting either a weapon’s test or a missile launch, all remained quiet in the hermit nation for the remainder of the year. But this morning the dictator released a statement through his country’s state-run media outlets that appears to explain what the real “present” was going to be. As of today, North Korea is no longer considering itself bound to the weapons testing moratorium agreed to between Kim and Trump. (NY Times) North Korea’s leader, Kim Jong-un, said his country no longer felt bound by its self-imposed moratorium on testing nuclear weapons and long-range ballistic missiles, its official media reported on Wednesday, the strongward path domestically but in terms of our negotiations with North Korea, we’re already hitting a sour note. And with Russia and China courting Kim’s favor these days, I’m not particularly hopeful of the situation improving any time soon

text1: 整形外科医生在被拒绝分享妻子的骨灰后提起诉讼 贝弗利山庄的整形外科医生对一家太平间和火葬场提起了数百万美元的诉讼，指控其与姻亲勾结，在已故妻子去世后拒绝给他一半的骨灰癌症。亚历山大·辛克莱博士声称，尽管他的妻子米泽京子在去年初去世后支付了超过 7,000 美元的火化费用，但他只得到了两盎司的骨灰。据称，他的姻亲米泽征治和米泽顺子收到了他妻子的大部分骨灰。亚历山大·辛克莱博士声称，他只得到了两盎司妻子米泽京子的骨灰，尽管在她最后早逝后支付了 7,000 多美元将她火化，并为他们的个人和商业利益赢得了声誉和大量资源，”诉讼称。 Sinclair 正在寻求一项禁令，命令被告向他提供 Kyoko 一半的骨灰和超过 500 万美元的惩罚性赔偿
text2: 比佛利山庄整形外科医生 BEVERLY HILLS 起诉太平间——久保田太平间和洛杉矶县火葬场公墓被比佛利山庄整形外科医生 Alexander Sinclair 博士起诉。辛克莱声称，在他已故的妻子米泽恭子于 2019 年 4 月 11 日死于胃癌后，久保田太平间承诺给他一半的骨灰。辛克莱向该设施支付了近 7,800 美元，将一半的骨灰由他自己和妻子的父母分享。 12 月 27 日向法庭提起的诉讼表明，辛克莱只收到了两盎司妻子的骨灰；不到他妻子骨灰的百分之十。这位整形外科医生正在就违反合同、欺诈、虚假陈述、故意和过失造成的指控寻求数百万美元的赔偿金。他已获得美国整形外科委员会 (ABPS) 的认证。他在密歇根州立大学人类医学学院获得医学学位，并在洛杉矶地区工作了 30 多年。由安妮塔布朗和凯西雅各布撰写

text1: 2020 y el progreso humano Este es el momento en que los calendarios pasan a un nuevo año y a una nueva década (con disculpas a quienes sostienen que eso no sucederá realmente hasta 2021). Enero presenta un nuevo comienzo. Un nuevo comienzo. Se han informado muchas malas noticias en el año y la década salientes. Muchos comentaristas de esta temporada parecen obligados a ofrecer un contrapeso, recordando amablemente a los lectores que se está avanzando mucho. De hecho, uno podría presentar un argumento convincente de que estos son los mejores tiempos de la historia humana. En todo el mundo, la pobreza está retrocediendo y la educación y la alfabetización van en aumento. Nunca en la historia tanta gente ha estado tan bien materialmente. Un índice mundial muestra que la prosperidad aumentó en 148 países y disminuyó solo en 19 durante la última década. Durante las últimas tres décadas, más de mil millones de personas en todo el mundo han salido de la pobreza extrema, de acuerdo con la creencia en la maldad irremediable del hombre, y en la futilidad del esfuerzo humano”. La esperanza, a la que a veces se hace referencia como la expectativa de algo bueno, podría ser solo el enfoque en el que basar el pensamiento y las acciones en el próximo año.
text2: EDITORIALE: C'è molto da celebrare all'inizio di un nuovo decennio "La vita è migliorata enormemente negli ultimi 250 anni ... (e) continuerà a migliorare in quasi ogni dimensione; salute, ricchezza, longevità, nutrizione, alfabetizzazione, pace, libertà e così via”. La gente festeggia il nuovo anno a Times Square a New York, mercoledì 1 gennaio 2020, (AP Photo/Craig Ruttle) Per molti, la nascita di un nuovo anno è un momento di riflessione e ottimismo, un'occasione per una risoluzione piena di speranza e ripristino personale. Ma questi non sono tempi normali. Conflitti politici apparentemente senza fine hanno creato un clima di rabbia, ansia e agitazione in molti ambienti, portando a un accresciuto pessimismo sul futuro. Ma mentre le nostre controversie sono effettivamente diventate più al vetriolo e divisivo, è importante prendere un aspetto più completo e Baumeister. "Non importa... chi vince le elezioni presidenziali, la persona media in America e nel resto del mondo diventerà con ogni probabilità più sana e ricca". E questo è un motivo per brindare al 2020 piuttosto che per temerlo

text1: CBI arrests DRI ADG, two businessmen in Rs 3 crore graft case LUDHIANA: The Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) on Wednesday arrested a senior Indian Revenue Service (IRS) officer — who is the additional director general (ADG) of the zonal unit of the Directorate of Revenue Intelligence (DRI), Ludhiana — in a Rs 3-crore bribery case.Prior to ADG Chandar Shekhar’s arrest, CBI nabbed two businessmen — Rajesh Dhanda of Ludhiana and Anup Joshi of Delhi — on Tuesday afternoon from a five-star hotel in Delhi with Rs 25-lakh cash, which they had allegedly accepted on behalf of the DRI officer. Dhanda is a prominent name in the city’s textile circle and has a huge business interest in Dubai, while Joshi is a customs clearing agent.A statement issue he grabbed national limelight when in two separate operations in Kashmir Valley, the DRI, in a joint operation with Army and other agencies, had seized heroin worth Rs 120 crore along with a huge cache of arms and ammunition from the border fence
text2:
CBI arrests ADG of Revenue Intelligence in Rs 25 lakh bribery case
The CBI on Wednesday arrested an Additional Director General of Directorate of Revenue Intelligence (DRI) Chander Shekhar and a middleman in connection with Rs 25 lakh bribery case, officials said.

The searches are going on in New Delhi, Noida and Ludhiana, they said.

According to the DRI web site, Chander Shekhar is posted as ADG, Ludhiana.

The agency had arrested the middleman while he was allegedly receiving the bribe on behalf of the officer, they said.

During the questioning, the middleman told the sleuths that the bribe was allegedly for the officer, they said.

The agency suspects it to be a part payment of a huge bribe which was discussed between the two, they said.

text1: 喀拉拉邦 CM 推出 K-RERA 以提高房地产行业的透明度特里凡得琅（喀拉拉邦）[印度]，1 月 1 日（ANI）：为了增强客户的信心并提高房地产行业的透明度，首席部长 Pinarayi Vijayan 于周三在这里启动了喀拉拉邦房地产监管局 (K-RERA)。 “只是因为少数房地产经纪人偏离了良好的做法并沉迷于非法方式来铸币，整个行业有时会受到影响。我们听说过像房地产黑手党这样的术语，”维贾扬在官员中说启动事件。 “破坏市场的是少数人的贪婪。随着房地产监管局（RERA）的到位，将会有更多的透明度和可信度。这也将有助于重新定义房地产的发起人-买方关系。部门和快速解决纠纷。根据该法案，拥有超过 8 套公寓的建筑物和 500 平方米或以上土地的房地产项目必须在 RERA 注册。（ANI
text2: K-RERA 将确保透明度：CM 喀拉拉邦房地产监管局 (K-RERA) 将帮助建立对房地产行业的信任，并为其注入透明度和效率，首席部长 Pinarayi Vijayan 周三表示。首席部长说，一些人的活动已经将这个重要部门诽谤到等同于“黑手党”的程度，并在这里正式成立了 K-RERA。他说，K-RERA 强调保护消费者（买家、受托人）的利益，专注于预防房地产行业的不当行为。欺骗买家 买家被房地产部门的某个部门欺骗的情况促使议会在 2016 年通过了《房地产（监管和开发）法》，规定所有州都必须在这种情况下成立 RERARERA。地方自治政府部长 A. C. Moideen 主持。额外的首席秘书 T.K. Jose、K-RERA 主席 P. H. Kurian 和成员 Preetha P. Menon 发言

text1: Cuánto pagará cada propiedad de aumento del Inmobiliario con la nueva ley Después de una larga pulseada con la oposición, el gobierno de Axel Kicillof ya cuenta con la Ley Fiscal 2020, que contiene subas en el Inmobiliario, Automotor (Patente) y en categorías de Ingresos Brutos, entre otros. Uno de los principales ejes de la polémica se instaló sobre el impuesto Inmobiliario -tanto urbano edificado y baldío como el rural- por la inclusión por parte del gobierno de incrementos de hasta el 75 por ciento para las propiedades de mayor valuación fiscal. Según explicó la Provincia, la intención era acentuar el carácter progresivo del esquema fiscal de la Provincia, haciendo que las subas sean más importantes para los sectores con mayor capacidad contributiva. La oposición, por su parte, aseguró que con la redacción original esa suba del 75 por ciento iba a recaer sobre sectores de clase media. Finalmente, 50 por ciento de aumento, y entre 84 mil y 630 mil, pagarán 75 por ciento de aumento. Finalmente, cuando las propiedades urbanas no edificadas superen los 630 mil pesos de valuación fiscal, el aumento del Inmobiliario será del 90 por ciento
text2: Cambios en el Inmobiliario para destrabar la Ley Fiscal El gobierno bonaerense entregó a Juntos por el Cambio una nueva propuesta fiscal que incorpora algunos de los cambios exigidos por la oposición e introdujo una modificación en la escala del impuesto inmobiliario, que mantendrá una suba del 75%, aunque alcanzará a menos propiedades. El texto, que aún no ingresó a la Legislatura, fue entregado esta tarde a los representantes de Juntos por el Cambio, durante un encuentro que encabezó la vicegobernadora Verónica Magario. La oposición, que más temprano había presentado un pliego con nueve puntos que incluía un tope máximo del 55% de aumento para el Inmobiliario, se encontraba reunida esta noche para analizar la letra fina del proyecto. Según se indicó, la propuesta duplica el valor fiscal de las partidas alcanzadas por el aumento del 75%, alcanzando a menos propiedades. «Esto elevan los montos imponibles de la facturación de las pymes rurales e industriales. También adelantó que se definió que los beneficiarios de la Asignación Universal por Hijo «no paguen impuestos en la provincia de Buenos Aires

text2: One person is dead, the other is in the hospital. A tragic fire in Silesia. One person was killed and the other was seriously injured in a fire in a kiosk in Chorzów (Śląskie Voivodeship). Even before the arrival of the firefighters, the policemen rushed to the rescue, they did not manage to extinguish the fire or save the person inside the structure. The tragic fire took place at Wolności Street in Chorzów. For reasons previously unknown, the kiosk there burst into flames. The fire was noticed by the policemen passing nearby. When they ran to the place, they noticed a burned man next to him who told them that his friend might be inside. The policemen notified the relevant services, and they themselves undertook the extinguishing action of the lagoon. The identity of the victim is currently being established. An autopsy has already been commissioned to determine the cause of death. The services were working on the spot, wanting to establish the detailed course and causes of the tragedy

text1: A partir de hoy aumenta costo de pasaportes para mexicanos en el extranjero A partir de hoy 1 de enero de 2020, todos los mexicanos radicados en el extranjero tendrán que pagar más por la emisión de pasaportes, matrículas consulares y declaratorias de nacionalidad. Informó la Dirección General de Servicios Consulares que a partir de esta fecha, todos los servicios que ofrecen los Consulados de México en el exterior tendrán costos más altos. Las nuevas tarifas marcan un costo de 30 dólares para la matrícula consular. Hasta la víspera costaba 27 dólares; el pasaporte por un año y casos de protección consular, 34 dólares; pasaporte por 3 años, 78 dólares y por 6 años 107 dólares. La declaratoria de nacionalidad tendrá un costo de 17 dólares, esto es dos dólares más que en 2019. Y los connacionales que hagan un testamento público abierto en una oficina consular en el extranjero pagarán un 50% del de Derechos para el ejercicio 2020, que se publicó en el Diario Oficial de la Federación el 9 de diciembre de 2019, las cuotas de los derechos en dólares estadounidenses por la prestación de servicios comprendidos en la Ley Federal de Derechos, se modificaran este 2020
text2:
Bajas ventas reportan vendedores ambulantes del mercadito de la Abraham González - Impacto
CAMARGO.- En el mercadito de la colonia Abraham González los vendedores ambulantes han reportado bajas en las ventas de manera considerable, según el líder de la zona exterior, Manuel Ramos.

Dio a conocer que sin duda en el 2019 hubo muchas mejoras por parte del alcalde Arturo Zubia Fernández, sin embargo, las personas no están acudiendo a realizar sus compras como en el pasado.

Informó que previo a la navidad se esperaba un repunte, sin embargo, acudió un 40% menos cantidad de gente.

“Quizás son muchos factores, entre ellos el frio. La gente no va a comprar como antes. Sin embargo, estamos mejorando gracias al alcalde”, informó.

text1: DPRK presents Cuba with flowers on 61st anniversary of Revolution DPRK presents Cuba with flowers on 61st anniversary of Revolution DPRK presents Cuba with flowers on 61st anniversary of Revolution DPRK presents Cuba with flowers on 61st anniversary of Revolution DPRK presents Cuba with flowers on 61st anniversary of Revolution Pyongyang, Dec 31 (Prensa Latina) The chairman of the State Committee of Korea, Kim Jong Un, presented Cuba with flowers on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the Revolution. The brotherly gesture by the top Korean leader was also made on behalf of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the entire people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK), the Korean Central News Agency (KCNA) reported. The source added that the action also took place on New Year's Eve, when both countries commemorate the 60th anniversary of relations between Havana and Pyongyang. In 2020ted the first anniversary of Cuban President Miguel Diaz-Canel's visit to the DPRK. According to KCNA, Kim Jong Un sent the flower basket to the Cuban Embassy in Pyongyang. jg/jcm/bj
text2: Cuba congratulated on 61st anniversary of its Revolution Cuba congratulated on 61st anniversary of its Revolution Cuba congratulated on 61st anniversary of its Revolution Cuba congratulated on 61st anniversary of its Revolution Cuba congratulated on 61st anniversary of its Revolution 31 de diciembre de 2019, 11:59Havana, Dec 31 (Prensa Latina) Governments and peoples worldwide have congratulated Cuba on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the triumph of the Revolution, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs informed on Tuesday. According to the source, Singaporean President Mdm Halimah Yacob congratulated the Cubans on behalf of his people on National Independence Day and wished peace and prosperity to the country.Dominican President Danilo Medina and Foreign Minister Miguel Vargas also expressed their good wishes for prosperity and well-being, as well as their most sincere congratulations.Latvian President Egils Levits and Foreign Minister Edgars Rink?viFor its part, the government of the Commonwealth of the Bahamas extended its sincere congratulations to Cuba for the celebration, and expressed its commitment to continue strengthening relations between the two nations.jg/iff/jcm/ev
