text1: Piden rotondas e iluminación para dos peligrosos cruces de rutas en La Pampa  El Pampeano Justialist Front Block (Frejapa) presentará un proyecto de resolución para solicitar al Gobierno Nacional a inscutientemente a los medios necesarios "para colocar la iluminación y la señalización horizontal", y analizar la viabilidad "de la ubicación de la rotonda, las semi rotondas o las puertas de enlace debidamente debidamente debutadas" en el Cruces de las rutas provinciales 7 y 1 con la ruta nacional 5. Los legisladores oficiales se destinaron a los cimientos de que esto permitirá "mejorar la visualización por aquellos que transitan por estas rutas". Y reconoce que el objetivo es "reducir el accidente de tráfico, Dado que se ha registrado un número significativo de accidentes, lo que resulta en la pérdida de vidas y las lesiones múltiples en las cruces listadas ". Los diputados d  Pampa concretó “la iluminación de la totalidad de cruces de rutas provinciales”, y ahora corresponde que los organismos nacionales concluyan “con estas tareas en pos de mejorar la seguridad vial en todo el territorio provincial”. Comentarios Comentarios
text2: En La Pampa, propone una APP para denunciar hechos que danen el medio ambiente  Los diputados del Frente Justicialista Pampeano (Frejapa) presentaron el proyecto "Alerta verde", donde se propone, desde una página web y una aplicación móvil, para llegar a los PampEanos una forma sencilla de dar una notificación sobre los hechos y los comportamientos que pueden potencialmente puedan Dañar el medio ambiente, como la quema al aire libre, los depósitos de residuos tóxicos o la descarga de aguas residuales, entre otras. "Necesitamos ponernos en manos de las herramientas simples de la ciudadanía para ayudarnos a evitar daños al medio ambiente. Debemos generar una conciencia ciudadana del problema ecológico, el medio ambiente y la salud. Y es esencial que podamos guiar los comportamientos de los pampeanos. "Hacia el cuidado de nuestro lugar en el mundo", dijo. La Pampa tiene una nueva le  e iniciar los procedimientos para controlarlos y repararlos si es posible. Debemos entre todos asumir la responsabilidad para poder vivir en un hábitat saludable, que nos permita realizarnos como comunidad”, destacaron en el comunicado de prensa. Comentarios Comentarios

text1:
Durango: Globo de cantoya provoca incendio en Gómez Palacio
Milenio Digital

La caída de un globo de cantoya entre maleza, basura y viejos neumáticos, provocó un incendio que alertó a vecinos y propietarios de una ferretería que se encuentra al lado del lote baldío, dando lugar a la movilización de Bomberos y Protección Civil.

Te recomendamos: Bomberos arrancan el 2020 con 12 incendios apagados

Ocurrió este miércoles a las 00:05 horas en la calle Japón y Francisco I. Madero, de la colonia Nuevo Los Álamos, en Gómez Palacio, Durango.





Al lugar arribaron elementos de Bomberos, quienes utilizando líneas de manguera y agua del camión cisterna sofocaron el fuego, evitando así que se extendiera al establecimiento comercial y a las viviendas cercanas.

La causa del incendio, según indicaron algunas personas, fue que en el lugar cayó un globo de cantoya aún encendido, lo que provocó que se quemará la maleza y basura acumulada.

​
text2:
Durango: Hombre hiere con arma blanca a su ex novia en Gómez Palacio
Milenio Digital

Un hombre al ver a su ex novia en compañía de su nueva pareja, los agredió con un arma blanca en Gómez Palacio.

El reporte se realizó la mañana de este miércoles, donde se informaba de la agresión a una pareja, mientras que el responsable ya había huido.

Elementos de diferentes corporaciones llegaron a la calle Patoni, en donde fueron heridos Óscar Jaime de 26 años y su novia Xóchitil, quien fueron trasladados a la Cruz Roja.

Sobre la agresión se mencionó que en determinado momento llegó el agresor que fue la pareja sentimental de la joven, quien los amenazó, después los golpeó y lesionó con el arma blanca que llevaba.

Ambos presentaron heridas punzocortantes las cuales no fueron de gravedad, siendo su estado de salud estable.

Mientras que los agentes del Ministerio Público de la Vicefiscalía de La Laguna de Durango, iniciaron la carpeta de investigación para dar con el responsable.

text1: Syd Mead, visual artist behind Blade Runner, dies at 86 LOS ANGELES (AFP) - American visual artist Syd Mead, who was behind the movie Blade Runner (1982) and credited with shaping the sci-fi landscape with his futuristic movie designs, has died at 86 in California. Mead, who worked on films including Aliens (1986), Tron (1982) and Star Trek: The Motion Picture (1979), died on Monday (Dec 30) following a battle with lymphoma cancer, according to multiple news outlets. A post on Mead's Facebook page confirmed the news, with the words "Syd Mead 1933-2019" . Mead had started his career in industrial design for the car and electronics industries, working for Ford, Chrysler, Sony and Philips, before switching to film. His concept art for a dystopian future Los Angeles in director Ridley Scott's neo-noir classic Blade Runner, starringates in November called Mead "one of the most influential concept artists and industrial designers of our time". Mead's recent movie art credits included Mission: Impossible III (2006), Elysium (2013) and acclaimed 2017 sequel Blade Runner 2049
text2: Latest Southern California storm fades, gusty winds expected LOS ANGELES — The center of Southern California’s latest storm stayed well out to sea Monday, keeping the bulk of its precipitation offshore after dousing the Central Coast. Only light snowfall or flurries were seen in the high mountain passes north and east of Los Angeles, and Interstates 5 and 15 remained open. Initial winter weather advisories for some mountain areas were canceled. The southward track of the storm hundreds of miles off the coast allowed the region to avoid a repeat of the holiday travel nightmare that occurred when a massive snowstorm hit on Christmas night. × Loading&hellp; {{title}} {{start_at_rate}} {{format_dollars}} {{start_price}} {{format_cents}} {{term}} {{promotional_format_dollars}}{{promotional_price}}{{promotional_ and then warm to the mid- to upper 50s (14 Celsius) by the end. text1: Distanzlos gegen Coronaregeln Christian Mang/REUTERS Auseinandersetzung zwischen »Coronarebellen« und Polizeibeamten auf dem Berliner Alexanderplatz Quer durch Deutschland ist am Wochenende gegen die Beschränkungen im Zuge der Coronakrise demonstriert worden – wobei zahlreiche Teilnehmer die Auflagen missachteten und den Mindestabstand von 1,5 bis zwei Metern nicht einhielten. Auf dem Alexanderplatz in Berlin kam es nach Polizeiangaben zu gewalttätigen Auseinandersetzungen zwischen Demonstranten und Einsatzkräften. Rund 1.200 Personen hatten sich demnach zu der nicht angemeldeten Demonstration versammelt. Mehrere Teilnehmer skandierten Parolen wie »Wir sind das Volk« oder »Freiheit, Freiheit«. Ein im Internet kursierendes Video zeigt Hendrik Sodenkamp, einen der Initiatoren der Berliner »Hygienedemos«, der sich auf dem Platz, zunehmend verzweifelt, über die Beteiligung von extremen Rechten beschwert – und damitelow (Linke) schrieb zu einem Foto, das Kemmerich in dem Protestzug zeigt: »Abstand halten oder Mundnasenschutzbe­deckung? – Fehlanzeige! Vorbildfunktion? – Fehlanzeige!« (AFP/dpa/jW
text2: Far-right backing for regional politician shocks Germany BERLIN: The small state of Thuringia broke a German political taboo on Wednesday after a candidate for the regional premiership was heaved into office with help from the far-right for the first time, sending shockwaves to Berlin. Chancellor Angela Merkel’s centre-right CDU party immediately called for fresh regional elections as a way out of the crisis, a call echoed by other mainstream parties. Thomas Kemmerich, a politician from the economically liberal Free Democratic Party (FDP), was elected as state premier after lawmakers from the far-right AfD gave him their backing. As a result, Kemmerich beat incumbent Bodo Ramelow of the Left party 45 to 44. “This is the first time in the history of modern Germany that a state premier has been elected with AfD votes,” political scientist Andre BrodoDP stablemates. Media were quick to describe the event as a “political earthquake”, as mainstream parties had so far refused to countenance working with anti-immigration, anti-minority and anti-EU AfD at any level. — AFP Relate

text1: Desde #AmINext hasta la xenofobia, las historias que sacudieron Sudáfrica en 2019 El año 2019 fue uno de los titulares sobre la horrible violencia cometida contra personas inocentes y vulnerables que viven en Sudáfrica. Desde los continuos ataques contra mujeres y niños, hasta los aparentes ataques contra ciudadanos extranjeros y el despliegue del ejército en Cape Flats, la violencia acaparó los titulares y la atención de los ciudadanos en 2019, quienes registraron su horror y marcharon en protesta para hacerse oír. Escuchó. El presidente Cyril Ramaphosa también canceló planes de viaje e importantes apariciones en foros económicos para dirigirse a la nación, y presentó medidas para demostrar que el gobierno se tomaba en serio los niveles de angustia en el país. ¿Cómo llegamos aquí? Cape Flats Ha habido una guerra total en Cape Flats durante muchos años, ya que las pandillas continúan luchando por el territorio y el poder. Aquellos que intentan seguir con su vida diaria, maestra, ella "necesita una mano y una de sus manos ha perdido la función, pero trataremos de restaurar la función de esa mano. Tomará múltiples cirugías". No sabemos lo que depara el 2020, pero el 2019 tiene muchas lecciones para Sudáfrica
text2:
Africa starts 2020 battling extremism, Ebola and hunger
Africa starts 2020 battling extremism, Ebola and hunger A tragic airline crash with far-reaching consequences, cataclysmic cyclones that may be a harbinger of the future, the death of an African icon and the rise of a new leader who won the Nobel Peace Prize

JOHANNESBURG -- A tragic airline crash with far-reaching consequences, cataclysmic cyclones that may be a harbinger of the future, the death of an African icon and a new leader who won the Nobel Peace Prize. These African stories captured the world's attention in 2019 — and look to influence events on the continent in 2020.

The battles against extremist violence and Ebola will also continue to be major campaigns in Africa in the coming year.

The crash of an Ethiopian Airlines jet shortly after takeoff from Addis Ababa in March killed all 157 passengers and crew. The disaster, which claimed the lives of a large number of U.N. officials, involved a Boeing 737 Max jet and came just five months after a similar crash in Indonesia of the same aircraft.

Boeing was inundated with questions about the safety of its plane. After initially claiming that it was safe, the company was forced to ground the plane after many countries refused to let it fly in their airspace. In December Boeing announced that it would suspend production of the jet.

The air crash was a trial for Ethiopia's reformist Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed, who later in the year won the 2019 Nobel Peace Prize for achieving peace with neighboring Eritrea. But Abiy is challenged by often violent ethnic rivalries in his country and elections set for May 2020 will be crucial, analysts say.

Cyclone Idai ripped into Mozambique in March, killing more than 1,300 people, making it “one of the worst weather-related disasters ever to hit the southern hemisphere,” according to the U.N. A month later Cyclone Kenneth roared into northern Mozambique, killing more than 50 people.

This was the first time in recorded history that Mozambique had two major cyclones, prompting some to worry that the country, with a 1,000-mile Indian Ocean coastline, may be prone to more storms as a result of climate change.

Across Mozambique more than 2.5 million people remain in urgent need of assistance, according to the U.N. Mozambique also starts 2020 troubled by ongoing attacks on vehicles in the country's central area and by Islamic extremist attacks in the country's north.

Extremist violence continues to vex Africa from the east to the west.

2019 began with extremist violence. In Kenya in January, insurgents launched an assault on a luxury hotel and shopping complex in Nairobi that killed at least 14 people.

The year came to an end with extremist attacks across the continent.

A bomb in Somalia killed 78 people, including many university students, in the capital, Mogadishu, on Dec. 28, the deadliest attack in years. Somalia's al-Shabab, allied to al-Qaida, claimed responsibility for the bombing.

In Nigeria extremists linked to the Islamic State group circulated a video showing 11 hostages, most of them Christians, being executed. They were thought to be killed on Christmas Day. The extremist group, which calls itself the Islamic State West Africa Province, said the captives were executed as revenge for the killing of Islamic State group leaders in Iraq and Syria in October.

In northern Burkina Faso, jihadists killed 35 civilians, most of them women, and ensuing clashes with security forces left 80 jihadists dead, the West African nation's president announced Dec. 24. That attack came weeks after an attack on a convoy carrying employees of a Canadian mining company in which at least 37 civilians were killed in the country's east. Both attacks were by groups numbering close to 100, indicating the presence of relatively large, well-organized extremist groups.

“The startling deterioration of the security situation in Burkina Faso has been a major development in 2019," said Alex Vines, director of the Africa program at Chatham House, the British think tank. ”There's been a dramatic spike in extremist attacks."

Frequent attacks in Burkina Faso's north and east already have displaced more than a half million people, according to the United Nations. While Burkina Faso's military has received training from both former colonizer France and the United States, it starts 2020 with little progress in halting the surge in extremist violence.

Congo starts the year waging a different kind of war — a campaign against Ebola, which has killed more than 2,200 people since August 2018. The medical effort to control the second deadliest Ebola outbreak in history has been severely hampered since the start by the presence of several armed groups in eastern Congo, the epicenter of the epidemic. It was hoped that new vaccines would help control the outbreak more quickly, but the violence has hampered those efforts.

Congo's President Felix Tshisekedi, elected in 2019, said in November that he was optimistic that the Ebola outbreak would be ended before 2020, but the epidemic continues throughout eastern Congo.

South Africa's President Cyril Ramaphosa, re-elected in 2019, said in a New Year's statement that the need to boost his country's ailing economy and create jobs is his biggest challenge for 2020. Nigerian President Muhammadu Buhari, also re-elected, has said that his government has controlled the rebellion by Boko Haram extremists, but violence continues to plague the country's northeast.

Zimbabwe's longtime ruler, Robert Mugabe, died at age 95 in September. Mugabe, the guerrilla leader who fought to end white-minority rule in Rhodesia and then ruled independent Zimbabwe from 1980 until 2017, left a mixed legacy of liberation, repression and economic ruin.

Zimbabwe begins the new year with severe economic problems including inflation estimated at more than 300% and widespread hunger. In an emergency appeal at the end of December, the U.N.'s World Food Program said that even though the southern African country had suffered a drought, Zimbabwe's food shortages are a “man-made” disaster, laying the blame squarely with President Emmerson Mnangagwa's government.

The once-prosperous country staggered to 2020 with power shortages lasting up to 19 hours per day and large parts of the capital, Harare, a city of some 2 million people, going without running water.

text1: Clarenceville : Alexandre et Ilana Dupont n'iront pas aux Jeux paralympiques  Sports - La majorité des activités sportives sur la planète ont été suspendues à cause de la pandémie coronavirus. Si l'incertitude repose toujours sur la tenue des Jeux paralympiques qui doivent avoir lieu du 25 août au 6 septembre à Tokyo, au Japon, le Canada a décidé qu'il n'enverrait pas ses athlètes au cours de l'été 2020 le Comité olympique canadien et le Paralympic canadien Le comité l'a annoncé le 22 mars, le soir. "Cette décision ne concerne pas seulement la santé des athlètes, c'est une question de santé publique, a déclaré le Comité canadien olympique., À titre de communication. Dans le contexte actuel de Covid-19 et des risques associés, il n'est pas sain pour nos athlètes ou la santé et la sécurité d  être le premier à prendre une décision qualifiée difficile. Aussi dur que ce soit, je suis tout à fait d'accord avec cette décision», a commenté Ilana Dupont sur sa page Facebook, au lendemain de la décision prise par le Comité olympique canadien.
text2: COVID-19 : le fédéral accorde 2 000 $ par mois aux travailleurs mis à pied  Ce soir, la Chambre des communes a adopté l'assistance d'urgence de 82 milliards de dollars aux Canadiens. Dans ce plan, nous trouvons, entre autres choses, le nouvel avantage d'urgence qui soutiendra tous les travailleurs lancés. Aperçus des quatre prochains mois, des travailleurs qui ont perdu leur emploi à cause de Covid-19, qu'ils. Soyez à plein temps, à temps partiel, contrat ou indépendant aura le droit de recevoir 2 000 $ chaque mois. En outre, les personnes malades, la quarantaine, qui s'occupent de quelqu'un avec CVID-19, des enfants ou des personnes âgées auront également accès à cette aide. Le gouvernement canadien ajoute à ce que ceux qui ont toujours leur emploi, mais qui ne reçoivent aucun salaire. Le portail e  Il est également possible pour ceux qui normalement n'ont pas le droit à cette aide de faire la demande. text1: Restriktive Regeln in Deutschland für die Abgabe starker Schmerzmittel  Oxycodon, der in den USA vertriebene Wirkstoff von Oxycontin, wurde vor gut 100 Jahren in Deutschland entwickelt und wird bis heute als starkes Schmerzmittel verschrieben. Hierzulande unterliegen Schmerzmittel, die laut WHO-Klassifizierung zur stärksten Stufe drei gehören, dem Betäubungsmittelgesetz. Missbrauch: theoretisch denkbar, aber schnell entdeckt Deshalb, erklärt Carsten Telschow vom Wissenschaftlichen Institut der AOK, können sie nur unter strengen Auflagen von einem Arzt verordnet werden. Dieser muss bei der Verschreibung besondere Sorgfalt walten lassen, die Abgabe muss lückenlos dokumentiert werden, es gibt Höchstbeträge für die Verschreibung für einzelne Patienten. Ein Missbrauch solcher Regelungen sei theoretisch denkbar, würde aber aufgrund der Auflagen sehr schnell auffallen, sagte Tel  lasse sich nicht ableiten, dass es in Deutschland ein umfassendes Problem mit Abhängigkeiten von Opioiden gebe. Offensichtlich setzt es sterben Ärzte diese Mittel verantwortungsvoll sein. Der einzelne Patient kann aber möglicherweise eine Abhängigkeit entwickeln.
text2: Germany's Merkel backs WHO as calls for more coronavirus cooperation Germany's Merkel backs WHO as calls for more coronavirus cooperation Published17 APRIL, 2020UPDATED 17 APRIL, 2020 BERLIN - German Chancellor Angela Merkel stressed the need for more global cooperation to tackle the coronavirus pandemic on Thursday and voiced support for the World Health Organisation after the United States cut its funding. Many world leaders have condemned a decision this week by U.S. President Donald Trump to suspend funding for the agency amid a crisis that has left more than 2 million people infected and almost 140,000 dead worldwide. Merkel told a video conference of leaders of the Group of Seven (G7) industrialised nations that the crisis can only be tackled with a strong and coordinated international response. And the German leader expressed her full support for the WHO in the call, her spokesman Steffen Seibert said in a statement. Merkel others to do the same. Maas also said the Alliance, set up by Germany and France in 2018 to support the United Nations, agreed that ensuring a fair distribution of protective materials, tests and medicine as soon as they are available to poorer nations was needed

text1: 圣地亚哥啤酒厂 Modern Times 开设期待已久的奥克兰酒吧 加利福尼亚州最受欢迎的精酿啤酒厂之一 Modern Times Beer 已进入湾区，并在奥克兰开设了一家新酒吧。圣地亚哥啤酒厂以其多样化和实验性的啤酒系列以及其古怪、风格化的内饰而闻名。凭借本月开业的新奥克兰酒吧间，它被称为“永久茶点之家”，它同时实现了这两个目标。位于梅里特湖几个街区的永久茶点之家由 4,000 平方英尺的粉红色、蓝绿色和橙色墙壁组成，墙壁上点缀着几何图案。 Modern 2410 Valdez St., Oakland 的 34 个龙头预计会看到全年、季节性和特别推出的啤酒，以及自家烘焙的冷泡咖啡。 510-545-4191 或 www.moderntimesbeer.com Janelle Bitker 是旧金山纪事报的特约撰稿人。电子邮件：janelle.bitker@sfchronicle.co
text2:
My Chemical Romance’s first reunion concert documented in fan-made film: Watch
My Chemical Romance, photo by Pooneh Ghana

My Chemical Romance performed their first reunion concert last month at Shrine Auditorium in Los Angeles. One fan named Jeyzeus Hays decided to memorialize the long-awaited comeback, My Chemical Romance’s first performance in seven years, by compiling multiple videos of fan footage into a proper concert film. The entire reunion video, titled My Chemical Romance – Live in California 2019, can be viewed below.

My Chemical Romance – Live in California 2019 captures every thrilling moment of the band’s official reunion, from the opening curtain drop on through to the final encore song. It clocks in just over an hour and 40 minutes, which means you can watch the entire show and feel like you were there. Hays compiled the footage from videos previously uploaded to YouTube as well as footage other fans sent over, and then mixed the audio from multiple sources.



“This is the full concert, edited together using thousands of cuts, merged audio, [and] multiple HD video sources to create a high quality version of the show,” Hays wrote on Reddit. “I’ve been working on it since the night of the show. It’s not official by any means, but it is the closest we are gonna get to a proper copy of the show.”

(Read: 10 Emo Albums Every Music Fan Should Own)

My Chemical Romance – Live in California 2019 is incredibly detailed and surprisingly well made, especially considering it’s a bunch of clips recorded by fans while singing their hearts out. For those who wished they could have been at the concert but couldn’t afford a plane ticket, this one is for you. Watch the film below.

This isn’t the last we’ll see of My Chemical Romance. Shortly after announcing their reunion, they quickly revealed a handful of 2020 tour dates, including stops in Australia and Japan. Grab tickets to all of their upcoming concerts here.

text1: Las partes dicen sí para mantener el Consejo Consultivo El primer ministro Hun Sen fue fotografiado con algunos miembros del Consejo Consultivo Supremo después de celebrar la reunión el 27 de diciembre de 2019. Página de Hun Sen en Facebook Las partes dicen sí para mantener el Consejo Consultivo Los miembros del Consejo Consultivo Supremo han Instó al gobierno a mantener vivo el organismo en el próximo mandato ya que ha sido útil para solucionar los problemas de la gente. El presidente del Khmer Rise Party (KRP), Sok Sovann Vathana Sabung, quien es miembro del Consejo, dijo el martes que apoyaba el deseo del primer ministro Hun Sen de que continúe desde el mandato del gobierno de 2023 a 2028. Dijo que era una oportunidad para que los partidos fuera del gobierno se unieran a él para encontrar soluciones para la gente. Dijo que su Partido Khmer Rise se había reunido con muchas familias en las comunidades para investigar sus problemas, como disputas por la tierra, funcionarios locales inactivos y el conflicto de disputas no está compuesto por varios partidos políticos, el consejo había contribuido mucho a la sociedad. “Involucrarse en política para servir a la sociedad no significa necesariamente insultarse unos a otros. Esto se aplica a los partidos pequeños y grandes”, dijo.
text2: Scuola "speranzosa" in mezzo all'ordine di trasferimento, il ministro dell'ispezione Men Sam An ha visitato la School of Hope nella provincia di Preah Sihanouk poiché deve affrontare problemi relativi alla sua posizione dopo che le autorità le hanno ordinato di trasferirsi entro tre mesi. scuola della speranza Scuola "speranzosa" tra ordine di trasferimento, ispezione A seguito di un ordine del primo ministro Hun Sen, il ministro delle relazioni Assemblea nazionale-Senato e degli uomini dell'ispezione Sam An ha visitato mercoledì la Scuola della speranza, situata su un terreno di 1 ha nella provincia di Preah Sihanouk . La scuola sta affrontando problemi di trasferimento dopo che il Ministero degli Affari Sociali, dei Veterani e della Riabilitazione dei Giovani ha recentemente ordinato di trasferirsi entro tre mesi. A dicembre, il primo ministro ha incaricato il Ministero delle relazioni e dell'ispezione tra Assemblea nazionale e Senato di indagare sulla questione e riferire su eventuali irregolarità poiché aveva ricevuto una denuncia dal Supremo paese. La Scuola della Speranza è un ramo delle Assemblee di Dio (ONG) che opera a Preah Sihanouk da circa 20 anni. Finora ha ospitato e fornito istruzione a circa 70.000 studenti e 50 insegnanti

text2: Desinfecta Gobierno Municipal parabuses de la ciudad en tres turnos  El gobierno municipal, a través de la dirección de mantenimiento urbano, realiza acciones diarias y permanentes de limpieza y desinfección de paradas de autobús durante la mañana, tarde y noche.Con un total de siete pandillas se extendió en tres turnos, se presta atención a la limpieza y desinfección con la presión y el agua desinfectante, un total de 220 puntos de paradas de autobús desde las avenidas principales de la ciudad, además del centro histórico.En este sentido, todo el día está desinfectando los parabuses, pero también, durante la noche se reúnen nuevamente, de modo que al comienzo del movimiento de los ciudadanos que utilizan el sistema de transporte público, están limpios y desinfectados.Esta actividad comenzó a llevarse a cabo desde mediados del mes de marzo, con el propósito de garantizar que los usuarios del transporte tengan una transferencia segur  se comenzó a realizar desde mediados del mes de marzo, con el propósito de garantizar que los usuarios del transporte tengan un traslado seguro y con las medidas de higiene necesarias para evitar así los contagios por COVID-19 en las paradas de autobuses. text2:
Hope from Europe on Economic Liberty
Last week I attended and spoke at a conference hosted by the Financial Times and JTI on economic regulation in Prague.

During my panel on the regulation of AI and other innovative new technologies, I made five substantive points about the economics and public policy implications of new technologies:

As far as possible, policymakers should allow permissionless innovation rather than be overly precautionary, only intervening when there was a clear need to do so for some specific application in a given product market. Where regulatory oversight occurs and new products compete with existing goods, policymakers shouldn’t automatically try to shoehorn innovations into current regulatory strictures to maintain a “level playing field.” New products often come with new safety features, for example, changing the balance of risks or mitigating previously perceived market failures. As such, innovation can compete with the regulator as well as incumbent products. Discussion of highly speculative extreme worst-case scenarios and ethical imperfections of new technologies sometimes seemingly ignore that the current world is not perfect, and human beings themselves exhibit biases. It’s a mistake to try to make perfect what is ever-evolving and already very good, especially if doing so deters other new innovations through fines or heavy compliance costs. In some fields where regulation is perceived to be needed, the rules should aim merely to solve the perceived problem proportionately and provide certainty for business. As Alexander Kryvosheyev from JTI explained, for businesses, regulatory clarity can be as important as the regulation itself. It may be that in some areas industry protocols and sharing of best practice can be facilitated, obviating the need for direct government regulation, but we should be ever mindful of the risk of cronyism and capture if this type of forum is provided through government. Regulatory policy is a terrible tool for dealing with distributional concerns re: the winners and losers of technological change.

All in all, I found the messages well received and the conference somewhat heartening.

Speaker after speaker in what was a central and eastern Europe heavy event bemoaned the tendency for Europe to be overly prescriptive with regulation and a mere talking shop for genuine pro-growth reform. Many indicated how the US was their beacon for a better environment for innovation in respect of new technologies.

What was clear though was an apparent appetite for change. Central and eastern European countries have already experienced significant economic upheaval over the past three decades. That means perhaps they are more willing to embrace a radicalism on moving in a market-friendly direction. Certainly, Czech Prime Minister Andrej Babiš talked a good game about the need for pro-market liberalization both domestically and within the EU, at one stage saying explicitly, “the biggest problem for regulation is in Brussels, not Prague,” and lamenting that “the European Union has no vision.”

With much Brexit Remain-sympathizing commentary both here and in the UK seeking to retrospectively paint the EU as a bastion of economic liberty, it was cheering to re-hear the sort of pro-liberty eurosceptic critiques of yesteryear and a determination to make Europe more open to wealth-enhancing innovation.

text1: RINO 参议员 Susan Collins 加入 Murkowski 并批评麦康奈尔承诺与白宫协调弹劾审判（网关权威）——RINO 参议员 Susan Collins（ME）加入了她的 RINO 参议员 Lisa Murkowski 并批评了麦康奈尔与白宫协调弹劾审判的承诺。 “我在此期间所做的一切，我都在与白宫法律顾问协调，”麦康奈尔最近告诉福克斯新闻的肖恩·汉尼提。 “总统的立场和我们在如何处理这件事上的立场没有区别。”上图：Murkowski，Collins 麦康奈尔对汉尼提说：“我们将如何前进，我将与总统的律师协调。” “从众议院传来的案子实在是太弱了。我们都知道它将如何结束。com/2020/01/rino-senator-susan-collins-joins-murkowski-and-criticizes-mcconnells-promise-to-coordinate-impeachment-trial-with-white-house
text2: 共和党参议员柯林斯表示，她对弹劾证人持开放态度 华盛顿（美联社）- 缅因州共和党参议员苏珊柯林斯表示，她愿意传唤证人，作为参议院对唐纳德特朗普总统弹劾审判的一部分，但她表示现在做出决定还“为时过早”在参议员看到所提供的证据之前，谁应该被传唤。柯林斯还表示，参议院多数党领袖、共和党人米奇·麦康奈尔在弹劾审判期间承诺白宫和参议院之间“全面协调”是不合适的。柯林斯周一在接受缅因州公共广播电台采访时说：“在我看来，过道两边的参议员在听到提交给我们的内容之前就预先判断证据是不合适的。”参议员宣誓在弹劾期间伸张公正的正义 - 宣誓立法者见证了特朗普的弹劾审判，但他表示他并不急于寻求新的证词。版权所有 2019 美联社。版权所有。本材料不得出版、广播、重写或重新分发

text1: Selena Gomez Rocks Dramatic Dark Lips, Giant Hoops e New Bangs all'album Party di New York - Foto Selena Gomez sembrava spigolosa e favolosa quando ha scosso un profondo labbro bordeaux, frangia frontale e enormi cerchi mentre promuoveva il suo nuovo album, "RARE", a New York il 14 gennaio. Selena Gomez, 27 anni, ultimamente ha ucciso il suo stile mentre promuoveva il suo nuovo album, "RARE", e il suo ultimo look potrebbe essere solo uno dei nostri preferiti. Sels si è recata al flagship store PUMA di New York City il 14 gennaio quando sembrava spigolosa e sexy con un trucco drammatico. Selena ha gettato indietro i suoi capelli castani in una coda di cavallo alta e disordinata, realizzata dall'hairstylist Marissa Marino, mostrando nuove lunghe e voluminose frange frontali che le coprivano la fronte e i lati del viso. Ha completato il suo look con un eyeliner da gatto nero, realizzato dalla truccatrice Hung Vanngo, che ha legato tutto il suo look. Abbiamo adorato tutti i look del tour stampa "RARE" di Selena e puoi fare clic sulla galleria qui sopra per vedere tutti i suoi splendidi look
text2: Selena Gomez giura ad alta voce in TV mentre tocca i vermi della farina, i capelli della doccia e altro: "Sono così dispiaciuto" — Guarda Una certa parola di quattro lettere è scivolata fuori dalla bocca di Selena Gomez in "The Tonight Show", che ha persino colto di sorpresa la cantante! Giureresti anche tu, se dovessi giocare allo stesso terrificante gioco a cui è stata costretta Selena. È il protocollo dello spettacolo a tarda notte di non giurare in televisione (o almeno, cercare di evitare), una regola che Selena Gomez ha appena infranto! La cantante 27enne aveva però buone ragioni per farlo, nell'episodio del 13 gennaio di The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon: è stata attaccata da un peluche. Ok, facciamo il backup: Selena stava gareggiando contro il conduttore Jimmy Fallon, 45 anni, in una partita di Can You Feel It? Come suggerisce il nome, Selena è passata al decennio successivo - i groovy anni '70 - togliendosi il vestito rosa Miu Miu e i tacchi Prada per indossare invece jeans a zampa, un maglione crema e stivaletti con stampa coccodrillo per la sua cena a base di sushi

text1:
Pierwsze osocze w Bydgoszczy pobrane. Ozdrowieńcy zgłaszajcie się - apeluje centrum krwiodawstwa
- Aktualnie przeprowadziliśmy już 30 rozmów kwalifikacyjnych z ozdrowieńcami - mówi Paweł Wojtylak, dyrektor RCKiK. - Jednak tylko w jednym przypadku pobraliśmy osocze. Nastąpiło to w miniony poniedziałek. Na przyszły tydzień mamy jeszcze zaplanowane pobrania od trzech osób, które przeszły pomyślnie sito kwalifikacyjne. Nabór ozdrowieńców musi być bardzo skrupulatny, poparty szczegółowym wywiadem, dlatego współpracujemy z lekarzami zakaźnikami, by pomogli nam we wstępnej selekcji ozdrowieńców. Tu znakomicie układa się współpraca z dr. nauk med. Pawłem Rajewskim.

Jak podkreśla Paweł Wojtylak, sporo osób, które się zgłosiły, miało przeciwwskazania do pobrania. - Na przykład były po zabiegach chirurgicznych, z chorobami przewlekłymi, czy po powrocie z podróży zagranicznej. To je zdyskwalifikowało - mówi. - Na razie pierwsze pobrane osocze jest badane. Musimy sprawdzić, czy miano przeciwciał jest odpowiednio wysokie. Jeśli okaże się, że tak, to możliwe będzie kolejne pobranie od tej osoby, za jej zgodą.
text2: Attention! Not everyone who has contracted COVID-19 can donate plasma. In our voivodeship, the Regional Center for Blood Donation and Haemotherapy in Bydgoszcz deals with the collection of plasma from convalescents. - We download them all the time. Some of them even gave them back a second or third time - says Paweł Wojtylak, director of RCKiK. - In this respect, our center is at the forefront of the country. As of May, there were already 53 donations, of which we could get 150 plasma units. As a region, we have plasma and if hospitals in the voivodeship report a need, we are prepared. If specific plasma groups are needed, we also transfer them to other hospitals in the country. It works both ways. Plasma is collected according to the same procedures as for blood donors. Not all who applied could, however, they did not contain the appropriate titers of antibodies - says Paweł Wojtylak. - Another thing is that not everyone could give them back. Such contraindications were, for example, age, undergoing surgery or chronic diseases

text1: Conmemoración virtual por la liberación de los campos nazis La pandemia del coronavirus obligó a cancelar en Alemania los actos que iban a efectuarse hoy y a conmemorar de forma virtual el 75 aniversario de la liberación de los campos de concentración de Sachsenhausen, Ravensbrück y Bergen-Belsen con un llamado a no olvidar. A través de videomensajes, el ministro de Asuntos Exteriores alemán, Heiko Maas, y la secretaria de Estado de Cultura, Monika Grütters, subrayaron la importancia de rendir homenaje a las víctimas del régimen nazi y de luchar contra el olvido. Más de 20.000 personas perdieron la vida en el campo de concentración de Sachsenhausen, una cada 3 horas, recordó Maas, quien agregó que si por cada uno de ellas se mantuviera un minuto de silencio, durante 2 semanas no se oiría nada. «Pero la lucha contra el olvido no puede ser silenciost, entre otros. Bergen-Belsen, campo en el que murieron unas 52.000 personas, fue liberado en abril de 1945 por las tropas británicas; los de Sachsenhausen y Ravensbrück, por el Ejército Rojo
text2:
Alemania conmemora 75º aniversario del fin del Holocausto a la sombra de la pandemia
En Bergen-Belsen, en el land (estado regional) de Baja Sajonia, los empleados del memorial depositaron ofrendas florales ante el "Muro de las Inscripciones", en tanto que alemanes a lo largo y ancho de todo el país guardaron un minuto de silencio en conmemoración del aniversario de su liberación, el miércoles pasado.

text2:
Buhari’s friend, Archbishop of Canterbury breaks silence on killings of 12 Christians
The Archbishop of Canterbury, Most Revd Justin Portal Welby has condemned the killing of 12 Christians by the Islamic State West Africa Province (ISWAP).

DAILY POST had reported that Christian captives were executed by the Islamic State West Africa Province (ISWAP) during the week.

The execution has been condemned by both international and local bodies, while some people have also totally blamed the unfortunate situation to the Muslims.

Reacting, Welch urged Nigerians and Christians all over the world to pray for Gods judgement on the killers.

The archbishop expressing sadness over the incidence described the victims as ‘Martyrs of Christ’

On his verified Twitter page, he wrote: “The murder by terrorists of 12 Christian hostages in Nigeria has been much ignored over Christmas.

“With deep sorrow let us pray for them and those close to them, and for God’s judgement on their killers. They are martyrs to Christ.”

text1: Ashrawi: Israel withholding tax revenues is criminal collective punishment 30/12/2019 National News PNN/ Ramallah/ The Israeli government has decided to withhold 150 Million shekels from Palestine’s tax revenues, in what Palestinians said was a blatant act of theft and political extortion. “This is a clear violation of Palestinian rights and signed agreements as well as a criminal act of collective punishment exacted for cynical domestic Israeli political reasons,” senior PLO member, Dr. Hanan Ashrawi said in a statement. “By this act of theft, the families of the victims of the Israeli occupation are punished and forced into poverty collectively,” she added. “In the context of the current domestic political stalemate, Israel is intensifying its violations against the Palestinian people.” The Palestinian leadership will not succumb to this political and financial aggression by Israel. The law was only partially implemented in 2019, starting from February. In October, Palestine accepted to receive a payment of tax revenues collected by Israel on its behalf after rejecting deducted money transfers by Israel for eight months
text2: Hamas calls for resistance against Israeli tax move Hamas calls for resistance against Israeli tax move Israeli security cabinet voted Sunday to deduct $43 million from tax funds that Israel transfers each month to Palestine Gulsen Topcu | 02.01.2020 Hamas calls for resistance against Israeli tax move GAZA, Palestine The Hamas resistance group called on the Palestinian administration Wednesday to work together with it and other groups against Israel’s decision to withhold millions of dollars in tax funds from Palestinians. In a statement, Hamas spokesman Hazem Qassem said the decision once again proves the "piracy of Israel." Israel’s security cabinet voted Sunday to deduct $43 million from the tax funds the Israeli administration transfers each month to the Palestinian Authority. Palestinians say the funds are needed to help families affected by violence and the Israeli occupation. The cabinet also approved the withholding of blockade of the Gaza Strip has shattered the coastal enclave’s economy and deprived its 2 million inhabitants of free movement in and out from Gaza, preventing the entry of many basic amenities. *Writing by Fahri Aksu

text1:
Neu-Isenburg: Heinz Schickedanz ist im Alter von 89 Jahren gestorben
Trauer um ein Isenburger Urgestein - Als „Blättche“-Journalist hat er lange Zeit das Geschehen in der Stadt dokumentiert.

Heinz Schickedanz ist im Alter von 89 Jahren gestorben.

Der Journalist war ein echtes Neu-Isenburger Urgestein.

Als „Blättche“-Journalist und Kolumnist „Oskar“ hat Schickedanz sich einen Namen in der Stadt gemacht.

Neu-Isenburg - Nur wenige Wochen nach seiner Ehefrau Irmgard ist am vergangenen Freitag der Journalist Heinz Schickedanz im Alter von 89 Jahren verstorben. "Jahrzehntelang hat Heinz Schickedanz das Geschehen in unserer Stadt als Redakteur des Neu-Isenburger Anzeigeblatts dokumentiert. In all seinen Berichten war das Isenburger Herzblut zu spüren. Mit seiner besonderen Menschlichkeit, seiner großen Hilfsbereitschaft und seinem wohltuenden Einfühlungsvermögen wird er uns allen sehr fehlen", erklären Bürgermeister Herbert Hunkel und Erster Stadtrat Stefan Schmitt in einem Nachruf.

Neu-Isenburger Urgestein: Heinz Schickedanz war an vielen Orten gleichzeitig

Wer in der Chronik des "Blättchens" blättert, gewinnt den Eindruck, dass der waschechte Neu-Isenburger an vielen Orten und Plätzen gleichzeitig war. Zudem konnte er sich in die Menschen hineinversetzen. So begleitete er - der zunächst Schriftsetzer und Maschinensetzer gelernt hatte und als Sportreporter begann - die Ereignisse.

Schickedanz war immer mit offenen Ohren und Augen dabei. Als Kolumnist "Oskar" nahm er auch Episoden aus dem Alltag auf oder kommentierte das Geschehen. Bis vor wenigen Jahren hat er diese Kolumne auf der Webseite des Vereins für Geschichte, Heimatpflege und Kultur (GHK) fortgesetzt.

Journalist schreibt Stadtgeschichte: Trauer um Neu-Isenburger Urgestein

Die "Oskars" sind fester Bestandteil der GHK-Homepage. Schickedanz hat nicht nur in diesem Sinne ein Stück Stadtgeschichte geschrieben. Hinzu kommen weitere Beiträge - darunter einige Zeitzeugenberichte - unter anderem in den Büchern „Neu-Isenburg, die besondere Stadt“ und „Ende und Anfang“ sowie in der Broschüre „Eine Nacht des Schreckens“, herausgegeben vom GHK.

Viele Jahre war er journalistisch auch für die Stadtillustrierte "Isenburger" unterwegs und kommentierte zugleich als "Maxe" das Geschehen. Sicherlich kann ein Teil der guten Entwicklung dieses Magazins auf sein Konto verbucht werden.

Ehrenamtliches Engagement: Schickedanz war auch in vielen Vereinen aktiv

Unvergessen ist auch sein vorbildliches Engagement für die örtlichen Vereine. Er war bei der Gründung des Franz-Völker-Kreises und des GHK*. Dort war er einige Jahre Schriftführer und Beisitzer im Vorstand. Ebenfalls für Kultur war Schickedanz bei der Interessengemeinschaft der Vereine in Neu-Isenburg* zuständig, wo er viele Jahre im Vorstand mitarbeitete. Die Stadt hat seine Verdienste 1980 mit der Verleihung Bürgermedaille und 2006 mit der Ehrenplakette gewürdigt.

„Wir werden Heinz Schickedanz immer in dankbarer und ehrender Erinnerung behalten“, versprechen Bürgermeister Hunkel und Erster Stadtrat Schmitt.

Von Holger Klemm

*fnp.de ist Teil des bundesweiten Ippen-Digital-Redaktionsnetzwerks.
text2: Intelligent. Chronique : Nous devons agir maintenant Comme beaucoup d'autres en ville, notre groupe est composé de personnes qui appartiennent à une catégorie qui nous rend plus vulnérables aux effets du virus. L'âge et les conditions médicales sous-jacentes pour plusieurs d'entre nous signifient que nous devons prendre des mesures sanitaires extrêmement prudentes et de bon sens dans notre vie quotidienne et lors de nos propres réunions de groupe en interne. Les membres de notre groupe ont une vie sociale et professionnelle active. Nous rencontrons de nombreuses personnes chaque semaine, que ce soit dans des contextes sociaux ou des environnements de travail. Du point de vue de la santé, nous sommes exposés à un grand nombre de personnes de différents lieux et horizons. Chaque semaine, nous nous rencontrons dans un endroit différent, généralement la maison ou l'appartement d'un membre, ou un bureau professionnel. Certains d'entre eux sont des espaces clos relativement petits. La taille des salles et la distance entre les membres pendant les réunions sont la fermeture exacte aujourd'hui, vendredi) Les installations du campus de Virgina Avenue Park ont fermé du 13/03 au 16/03. text2:
Lion Country Safari introduces new baby lion cubs
A litter of African lion cubs were born at Lion Country Safari on Nov. 8 of last year. These are the first cubs to be born at the animal attraction in nearly 20 years.

The cubs, Atlas and Mara, are the children of mom, Leela, and dad, K'wasi.

The cubs weigh about three pounds and are sightless and completely reliant on their mom for survival. They are spending time with Leela before being brought to exhibit on the preserve. "It will be about two weeks or so until the cubs will be intermittently visible to the public but Leela and the cubs will actually set the pace for this process, says Lion Country Safari Spokesperson Haley Passeser.

text1: Delaware GOP chairs under fire for homophobic, anti-Semitic language Left to Right: New Castle County GOP Chair, Chris Rowe; Sussex County GOP Vice Chair Nelly Jordan The New Castle County Republican Party Chair and the Vice Chair of the Sussex County Republican Party have come under fire for homophobic, anti-Semitic language used on social media. New Castle County Republican Chair Chris Rowe has come under fire after he used homophobic language on Facebook, describing what he said as “locker room talk” and saying it wasn’t meant to disparage homosexuals. Rowe, a longtime political figure in New Castle and now county Chair of the Republican Party, used the word “faggot” in a comment on Facebook where he was dismayed that the social media site removed a video he was trying to post. “It was locker room talk between longtime male the strongest possible terms, the always odious use of bigoted words and the hatred that such conduct encourages.” WGMD News has reached out to Delaware Republican Party Chairwoman Jane Brady who has yet to respond to a request for comment
text2: VIDEO: Gowdy Doubts Dems Can Persuade a Single GOP Senator on Impeachment Trial Appearing on Fox News, former congressman Trey Gowdy said he believes if the impeachment trial were held today “the president would win. And I don’t think he’d lose a single Republican senator and he might pick up one Democrat.” Gowdy suggested Republicans get the trial over with without witnesses since they have the numbers, saying “if you have the jury and you know how they’re going to know how they’re going to rule, go ahead and get it over with. And then the president can say whatever he wants to after the trial is over.” Gowdy also revealed he believes Pelosi’s stalling tactic is about putting GOP Senators in swing districts in “tight spots” which she thinks might help Democrats take back the Senats in tight spots in November, Cory Gardner and Thom Tillis and Susan Collins and Martha McSally. Put them in tight spots, make them cast difficult votes.” WATCH: This article first appeared on TheConservativeOpinion.co

text1: Afrique du Sud : Vidéo incroyable - un grand requin blanc nage juste à côté d'un groupe de surfeurs sans méfiance Un enregistrement de drone a émergé Incroyable séquence de drone d'Afrique du Sud : Un grand requin blanc nage juste à côté de surfeurs - le groupe ne semble pas remarquer l'animal au début. Une vidéo de drone a récemment fait surface, qui aurait été prise en Afrique du Sud. On y voit : des surfeurs dans l'eau - et un grand requin blanc. La ville du Cap donne donc des conseils sur la manière de se comporter. Cape Town - Une incroyable vidéo de drone d'Afrique du Sud fait actuellement sensation. Vous pouvez le voir : plusieurs surfeurs à la surface de la mer. Au début, ils ne remarquent même pas le requin qui tourne sous l'eau entre eux. Lorsque les surfeurs réalisent enfin le danger, ils essaient de rester proches les uns des autres et de s'éloigner du requin, la raison : lui aussi a été attaqué par un requin. En Égypte, une attaque de requin sur un enfant de 12 ans et son moniteur de plongée s'est également soldée par un drame. Liste des rubriques : © dpa / Helmut Fohringe
text2: Les stars de Love Island pourraient porter des pulls au lieu de bikinis alors que les températures chutent Inscrivez-vous aux alertes e-mail quotidiennes GRATUITES de Mirror - Daily Love Island pourrait être laissé porter des pulls au lieu de bikinis cette série au milieu des températures plongeantes au Cap. Le spectacle a déménagé en Afrique du Sud pour profiter au maximum de l'été du pays, les insulaires devant profiter de températures maximales quotidiennes d'environ 28 degrés Celsius. Cependant, les températures chuteront à environ 12 degrés Celsius le soir, ce qui signifie que les étoiles devront peut-être se couvrir si elles veulent s'asseoir dehors. La nouvelle villa est également située au sommet d'une colline, ce qui la laisse ouverte aux vents froids qui pourraient laisser les insulaires courir pour leurs lainages d'hiver. Cela peut expliquer pourquoi les patrons de l'émission ont introduit une nouvelle approche. Alors que l'intérieur du Hideaway a été décoré dans des teintes roses vibrantes. text2:
WeShare expands in Europe
WeShare, Volkswagen and SKODA’s free-floating car sharing service, is to expand into seven further cities in Germany and other European countries in 2020.

Prague and Hamburg in the spring are to be followed by Paris, Madrid, Budapest, Munich and Milan in the course of the year. In all these cities, WeShare will be offering an all-electric fleet with a total of about 8,400 electric vehicles.

In Prague and Budapest, WeShare will cooperate with SKODA. In the other major cities in Germany, France, Spain and Italy, WeShare vehicles on offer will include...

text1: 5 星乔治亚州 CB 目标 Kelee Ringo 否认谣言他致力于德克萨斯州 5 星乔治亚州 CB 目标 Kelee Ringo 否认谣言他致力于德克萨斯州2020 年 1 月 1 日 5 星角卫 Kelee Ringo 明确表示，他尚未与德克萨斯长角牛队签约 佐治亚州球迷本周早些时候无疑有点紧张，因为 5 星角卫 Kelee Ringo 出现在陆军全美碗上摇摆着德克萨斯装备.这是否意味着他实际上与长角牛队而不是乔治亚队签约？随着社交媒体上流传的报道和谣言林戈已经停止了他的招聘以支持 UT，这位 5 星级的前景很快在 Twitter 上澄清了一切。老实说，我只有我喜欢穿的衣服吗？你们都让它成为一件事？？ ♂️ — Kelee Ringo (@KeleeRingo) 2019 年 12 月 30 日 And.com/cUJimooIkA — Brandon Huffman (@BrandonHuffman) 2019 年 12 月 30 日 每个人都会在周六知道 Ringo 是否要去德克萨斯州的乔治亚州，或者他是否会以不同的学校

费城老鹰队签下前 UGA 足球巨星
就在 NFL 季后赛开始前，费城老鹰队于周二签下了前乔治亚州足球巨星以利亚·霍利菲尔德。

名册变动：#Eagles 已签下 RB Elijah Holyfield，并将 DE Daeshon Hall 置于预备队/受伤队。 pic.twitter.com/wlVFFUB6ao — 费城老鹰队 (@Eagles) 2019 年 12 月 31 日

霍利菲尔德在季前赛中以落选自由球员的身份与黑豹队一起打球，但没有进入 53 人名单，并将与他们的练习队签约。

现在，在卡罗来纳州选择不与他签订期货合同后，这位来自伍德沃德学院的前四星将在本周末开始与西雅图海鹰队争夺超级碗戒指。

text2: Kiara Advani Opens Up on Facing Failure in Bollywood, Says 'Glad I Didn't Give Up' Kiara Advani didn't find success right away. It took her a long time to make a name for herself in Bollywood, and the actress says she is happy that she didn't stop trying. After making her debut with Akshay Kumar's poorly received comedy Fugly in 2014, Kiara appeared in the Sushant Singh Rajput-starrer M S Dhoni: The Untold Story. Even as the film was a success, it didn’t help the actress much professionally. "It can make you feel a little low when you are just waiting for opportunities. But I feel glad that I didn’t give up and I went after my dream, that' why today things are looking brighter. If you have the talent then nobody can take that away from you," Kiara said. text2:
伊拉克战争后美国情报报告预测 2020 年看起来“非常有先见之明”，仅与机构的政治失误相比——
一份有 15 年历史的英特尔报告预测 2020 年的世界因其准确性而备受赞誉，但它所描述的大部分未来已经在 2004 年进行。今天高度政治化的情报界还能看到那么多吗？

推出一系列“非常有先见之明”的预测，以吹嘘它们的准确性——这里没有飞行汽车！ – 国家情报委员会 (NIC) 的报告正是人们对英特尔社区的期望，他们迫切希望在竞争激烈的总统选举之前巩固其声誉。

text1:
مصطفى بكرى: المنظومة الصحية تحملت عبئًا جبارًا في مواجهة "كورونا"
كتب- معتز عباس:

قال الإعلامي مصطفى بكري، إن المنظومة الصحية المصرية تحملت عبئًا جبارًا خلال أزمة فيروس "كورونا".

وأضاف "بكري"، خلال تقديمه برنامج "حقائق وأسرار"، المذاع على قناة "صدى البلد"، اليوم الخميس، أن الوضع العالمي بخصوص فيروس "كورونا" مقلق يمضي نحو المجهول نظرًا لعدم اكتشاف علاج حتى الآن للوباء، مؤكدًا أن القيادة والحكومة المصرية وكافة الوزارات المعنية لعبت دورًا مهمًا للغاية في الفترة الماضية، وبذل الأطباء والممرضون جهودًا جبارة.

وأوضح أن الدولة لا تتحمل زيادة أعداد الإصابات بفيروس "كورونا" فالشعب يتحمل ذلك، خاصة مع وجود مظاهر في الأفراح والأسواق فيجيب على الجميع الالتزام بالتعليمات الوقائية، لافتًا إلى أنه من ضمن الظواهر السلبية تبادل الماسك لرواد البنوك بعد قرار يمنع دخول أي مواطن المنشآت الحكومية بدون ارتداء كمامة.
text2:
مصطفى بكرى يناشد رجال الأعمال بدعم العمالة غير المنتظمة
كتب : معتز عباس

ناشد الإعلامي مصطفى بكري من رجال الأعمال بدعم العمالة غير المنتظمة وذلك على خلفية الإجراءات الاحترازية لمواجهة فيروس كورونا.

وتابع بكري، خلال تقديمه برنامج "حقائق وأسرار"، المذاع على قناة "صدى البلد"، اليوم الخميس، أن الحكومة اضطرت لتعديل الموازنة العامة خلال العام الجاري بما يتماشى مع الوضع الراهن.

وأشاد الإعلامي مصطفى بكري، بالتزام الشعب المصري بإجراءات الحد من فيروس كورونا المستجد، موضحا أن الجميع في العالم يتابع أخبار الوباء العالمي بقلق بالغ.

text1: Web Tapu ile yaklaşık 30 bin konut online satıldı  Yeni Tip Koronavirüs (KOVID-19) kapsamında Çevre ve Şehircilik Bakanlığına bağlı olarak Çevre ve Şehircilik Bakanlığı (KOVID-19) nedeniyle, vatandaşlar günümüze kadar 113 bin işlem yaptılar.Web Tapından.Bu süre zarfında 29 bin 748 konut çevrimiçi olarak satıldı..gov.tr Online yapmaya karar verdi.Ve işlemlerinin tüm aşamasını takip eden vatandaşlar, sadece son aşamada ıslak imza için senet Müdürlüklerine gitti.Türkiye ayrıca web tapu'da 29 bin 748 konut satışı olarak da mevcuttur.Esenyurt, Pendik, Ümraniye, Küçük Çekmece ve Kadıköy'de yapıldı.İzmir, 4 bin 496 ve 4 bin 149 satış ile Bursa'yı takip etti.19 bin 370 vatandaş mortgage'u bin 370 vatandaş çevrimiçi tapu ile kaldırdı.Teminat gösterildi.Web tapu'da 2 / B topraklarının satışında 160  kredi için kredia kredi tahsis edildi. yandan 6292 Ötesi gereği yapılması gereken 2/ arazileri içinde Web TapuB. 2/B arazilerinin satışına yönelik Web Tapu'da 1600 işlem yapıldı.
text2: Kredi limitlerinin yakınlaşması sektörü hareketlendirdi  Emlak sektöründeki emlak sektöründeki emlak sektöründeki emlak sektöründeki, Mayıs ayının varışında hareketli günlerde, elfi emlak kuruluşu Özkan Aydemir, satıcılar için çok önemli bir dönem olduğunu belirtti. Gündem ve korona sürümünün inşaat sektörü. Yukarı hareket ettiğini söyledi. Şirketimiz ayrıca konut alımlarını sanal örneklem turları ve uzaktan çevrimiçi satış sistemleri ile devam etme fırsatı da olmuştur. Corona sekreterinden sonra, emlak sektörü 3 kritik dönemi bekliyor. Yeni normal dönemin ilk döneminden hemen sonra yaşanacak gayrimenkullerde, ekonomik yenileme ve adaptasyon dönemi ve üçüncü dönem stratejik gelişim süresi olacaktır. "Arazi yatırımcıları için yıllardan bu yana konut yatırımcıları kabul edilmedi ve bir takım havader'ları olan bir takım oldu. Elfi-Emlak Kurucusu Özkan Aydemir'in belirlenmesi,  Manisa, Gaziantep, Balıkesir, Kocaeli, Adana, Aydın, Tekirdağ ve Muğla şeklinde sıralandı" dedi. text1:
Ben Laughlin diventa il primo giocatore di bocce a scalpare 100 wicket in BBL
Carrara [Australia], 01 gennaio (ANI): il pacer dei Brisbane Heat, Ben Laughlin, mercoledì è diventato il primo giocatore di bocce a scalare 100 wicket nella Big Bash League.

Ha raggiunto l'impresa nella partita BBL in corso tra Heat e Perth Scorchers.

Il pacer ora ha 100 wicket da 79 partite, mentre Sean Abbott di Sydney Sixers è al secondo posto con 96 scalpi da 74 partite.

Kane Richardson dei Melbourne Renegades è al terzo posto con 81 wicket in 64 partite.

Laughlin ha licenziato Ashton Agar dei Perth Scorchers in finale registrando il suo centesimo licenziamento nella competizione nazionale australiana T20.

Il pacer è tornato con le cifre del bowling di 2-32 nei suoi quattro over e Brisbane ha limitato Perth a 147/6 nei venti over assegnati. (ANI)

text1: Bericht: Irans Regierung bestellt Schweizer Botschafter ein  Tragen Sie mit Hinweisen an diesen Artikel oder kontaktieren Sie uns Fehler. "Das iranische Außenministerium hat am Mittwoch den Schweizer Botschafter in Teheran einberufen", schreibt die "Teheran Times" auf ihrer Website. Die iranische Nachrichtenagentur "Mehr Nachrichtenagentur" berichtet auch über seine Seite darüber. Die Schweiz vertritt US-Interessen in der Islamischen Republik. Die EDA hat unsere Anfrage noch nicht kommentiert. Darüber hinaus war der "Teheran Times", der Botschafter, eingeladen worden, "den starken Protest des Landes gegen die Kriegerwörter von Washington und den lostlosen Vorwürfen gegen den Iran» .mohsen Baharvand, der Generaldirektor des iranischen Außenministeriums, auszudrücken Angelegenheiten für amerikanische Angelegenheiten haben dem Schweizer Messenger Markus Leitner den offiziellen Protest-Note seines Landes übergeben. Weitere Proteste aus der US-Bo Wertigkeit zu den USA. Die US-Regierung geht davon aus, dass Teheran seinen Einfluss auf schiitische Milizen zuletzt gezielt für Angriffe gegen das US-Militär genutzt hat. Dies wird vom Iran vehement bestritten. (cpm)
text2: Angriff auf US-Vertretung in Bagdad "Die Botschaft ist angekommen"  Der iranische Oberhaupt reagierte stark an den Erklärung von US-Präsidenten Trump, der Iran ist, die Eskalation im Irak zu beschuldigen. Vor der US-Botschaft in Bagdad, entspannte sich die Situation, nachdem die Demonstranten zurückgefordert wurden, sich zurückzuziehen. Im Irak bleibt die Situation angesichts des Konflikts zwischen den USA und dem Iran angespannt, obwohl die Situation vor der US-Botschaft in Bagdad am Dienstag, pro-iranische Demonstranten, teilweise militärische Uniformen, entspannt ist, die teilweise militärische Uniformen trugen, stürmten den Rezeptionsbereich von Das umfangreiche Gebäude, Fenster und bewaffnete Kleiderschränke. Mehrere Schutzhäuser vor dem Gebäude wurden in Brand gesetzt. US-Bürger wurden nicht verletzt. Am Morgen gab es neue Zusammenstöße zwischen den militanten Demonstrante T. Jegliche Schäden oder Opfer würden dem Iran teuer zu stehen kommen, schrieb Trump auf Twitter. rechne er nicht mit einem Krieg gegen den Iran, dennoch erklärte er. Über dieses Thema berichtete die tagesschau am 01. Januar 2020 um 17:40 Uhr.

text1: Elektroauto-Fahrer als „Schnorrer“ beschimpft Um diesen Gedanken in seiner Gemeinschaft zu stärken, bot Bürgermeister Heinrich Preus den Komfort, ihr E-Auto an der Ladestation auf dem Marktplatz kostenlos aufzuladen. Ein Umstand, der mindestens einen Bürger eindeutig massiv verdrängen scheint., ein unbekanntes, der dem Paar von Folienbotschaften mit der Inschrift "Schnorler" und ähnliche mündliche Angriffe hinter den Scheibenwischern des Elektroautos ist.  zumindest einem Mitbürger offenbar massiv zu missfallen scheint. Seit Monaten legt bereits ein Unbekannter dem Paar vor, nämlich folierte Botschaften mit der Aufschrift „Schnorrer“ und ähnlichen Verbalattacken hinter die Scheibenwischer des Elektroautos.
text2:
21st Austria weekly - Foreign trade statistics (31/12/2019)
Regional foreign trade: In the first half year of 2019, seven out of nine Austrian federal states registered increases on the export side, according to preliminary results by Statistics Austria. The federal states Vienna (+7.8%) and Styria (+7.6%) realised the highest relative increases. In absolute terms, Styria (+Euro 0.94 bn), Vienna (+Euro 0.75 bn) and Upper Austria (+Euro 0.74 bn) showed the strongest gains. Carinthia (-4.3% or - Euro 0.17 bn) and Lower Austria (-1.8% or - Euro 0.21 bn) registered a decline compared to the previous period. On the import side, Styria (+6.4% or + Euro 0.61 bn), Lower Austria (+5.7% or +Euro 0.74 bn) and Vorarlberg (+4.2% or + Euro 0.16 bn) recorded the strongest relative increases compared to the previous half year. text1: India aprueba tercera misión lunar, meses después de aterrizaje fallido BENGALURU (Reuters) - India aprobó su tercera misión lunar meses después de que la última no lograra aterrizar con éxito en la Luna, dijo el miércoles su agencia espacial, el último esfuerzo en sus ambiciones de convertirse en una potencia espacial de bajo coste. La misión Chandrayaan-3 tendrá un módulo de aterrizaje y un rover, pero no un orbitador, dijo a los periodistas el presidente de la Organización de Investigación Espacial de la India (ISRO), K. Sivan, en su sede en Bangalore, según una transmisión oficial. La misión Chandrayaan-2 en septiembre desplegó con éxito un orbitador lunar que transmite datos científicos a la Tierra, pero no pudo colocar un rover en la superficie lunar después de un aterrizaje "duro". Esa misión tenía como objetivo aterrizar en el polo sur de la luna, donde ninguna otra misión lunar había llegado antes. Se cree que la región contiene agua". Sivan también anunció que ISRO había comenzado el proceso de adquisición de terrenos para un segundo puerto espacial en la ciudad portuaria sureña de Thoothukudi en el estado de Tamil Nadu. (Reporte de Sachin Ravikumar; Editado por Kim Coghill
text2:
India targets new moon mission in 2020
BANGALORE: India plans to make a fresh attempt to land an unmanned mission on the moon in 2020 after a failed bid last year, the head of the country's space programme said on Wednesday (Jan 1).

Work is going "smoothly" on the Chandrayaan-3 mission to put a rover probe on the moon's surface, Indian Space Research Organisation chairman K. Sivan told a press conference.

Advertisement

Advertisement

"We are targeting the launch for this year but it may spillover to next year," Sivan said. Indian sources said authorities had set November as a provisional target for launch.

India seeking to become only the fourth nation after Russia, the United States and China to put a mission on the moon's surface and boost its credentials as a low-cost space power.

The country's Chandrayaan-2 module crash-landed on the moon's surface in September.

Sivan said the new propulsion module, lander and surface rover would cost about US$35 million, with a significantly higher outlay for the launch itself.

Advertisement

Advertisement

He added that India had chosen four candidate astronauts to take part in the country's first manned mission into orbit, pledged to take place by mid-2022.

The four are to start training in Russia later this month. Up to three astronauts are to take part in the mission, which will be one of the landmark projects scheduled for the 75th anniversary of India's independence from British rule.

text1: Гоны убегают! Шокирующий побег бывшего главы Nissan, чтобы навредить делу Гон говорит, что ему удалось избежать несправедливости и политических преследований — к шоку его группы защиты в Японии. Праздничный сезон не принес хороших новостей японским властям, расследующим дело бывшего генерального директора Nissan Карлоса Гона о финансовых нарушениях. В понедельник они обнаружили, что Гон исчез, сбежав из дома в Токио, ускользнув от усиленного наблюдения и видеонаблюдения. Некогда тост автомобильной промышленности и пользующийся большим уважением в Японии, Гон впал в немилость, когда в 2017 году появились новости о предполагаемых финансовых нарушениях; он был арестован в ноябре 2018 года по возвращении в Японию из Ливана, где он сейчас всплыл. В то время как нет убедительного отчета о том, как Гону удалось совершить один из сенсационных побегов, ливанские СМИ сообщают, что, поскольку он заявлял о своей вере в надлежащую правовую процедуру, заявляя, что это в конечном итоге докажет его невиновность. Что показывает l'affaire Ghosn и les Deles Andersen, Mallya и другие, так это то, что иногда деньги могут перехитрить правосудие.
text2: Карлос Гон встретился с президентом Ливана после бегства из Японии: источники Беглый бывший председатель Nissan Карлос Гон встретился с президентом Ливана после побега из Японии, куда он был тайно вывезен из-под домашнего ареста частной охранной компанией, сообщили в среду два источника, близких к Гону. Один из источников сказал, что Гон был тепло встречен президентом Мишелем Ауном в понедельник после полета в Бейрут через Стамбул, и теперь он был в бодром и воинственном настроении и чувствовал себя в безопасности. Источники сообщают, что на встрече с президентом Гон поблагодарил Ауна за поддержку, которую он оказал ему и его жене Кэрол, пока он находился под стражей. Они добавили, что теперь он нуждается в защите и безопасности своего правительства после бегства из Японии. Медиа-консультант офиса президента отрицал, что двое мужчин встречались. Ливанские официальные лица заявили, что никто из них не родился в Бразилии, но ливанского происхождения и в детстве жил в Ливане. Он руководил реорганизацией французского автопроизводителя Renault, за что получил прозвище «Убийца затрат», и использовал аналогичные методы для возрождения Nissan.

text1: Gli incendi boschivi nell'East Gippsland lasciano 28 dispersi mentre le città evacuano prima del fine settimana ad alto rischio Le autorità del Victoria stanno intensificando gli sforzi per raggiungere ed evacuare le comunità isolate nell'East Gippsland, dove 28 persone rimangono disperse dopo che gli incendi distruttivi hanno colpito la regione. Punti chiave: le comunità remote in tutta la regione stanno evacuando in convogli o si stanno preparando a rimanere e difendere le comunità remote in tutta la regione stanno evacuando in convogli o si stanno preparando a rimanere e difendere l'emporio In una città isolata, diversi residenti fanno affidamento su un'unica radio condivisa nell'emporio Per le ultime informazioni, visitare il sito web di Vic Emergency. Il premier Daniel Andrews ha detto che 24 comunità vittoriane erano ancora isolate dagli incendi boschivi giovedì pomeriggio. Le squadre di soccorso stavano combattendo per liberare le strade per raggiungerli in modo da poter evacuare. Abbiamo bisogno di evacuare questa città", ha detto alla folla attraverso un altoparlante su uno dei camion della brigata. "Vacanze, residenti, tutte queste persone davanti a me che mi guardano, dobbiamo lasciare Metung.
text2: Diciassette dispersi, uno morto dopo i devastanti incendi boschivi a Victoria, in Australia Ci sono gravi timori per 17 persone scomparse nei massicci e mortali incendi boschivi dell'East Gippsland nel Victoria. Il premier del Victoria Daniel Andrews ha detto ai giornalisti giovedì che nessuna delle 17 persone scomparse nella regione è personale dei servizi di emergenza. L'aumento del numero arriva dopo che i membri della famiglia hanno confermato che l'uomo di Buchan Mick Roberts era morto a casa sua. "Ci sono almeno 17 persone di cui in questa fase non possiamo spiegare. La loro ubicazione non ci è nota, inoltre c'è una persona confermata come deceduta", ha detto Andrews ai giornalisti a Bairnsdale. "Anche se la polizia del Victoria non ha completato i processi di identificazione ufficiale, è chiaro che la famiglia Roberts ha identificato il signor Roberts e mandiamo le nostre condoglianze alla loro famiglia e alla comunità Buchan a cui era così noto e che teneva in grande considerazione i venti caldi e possibili temporali aumenteranno il rischio di nuovi incendi. Le persone vicino all'incendio di Corryong nel nord-est del Victoria, vicino al confine con il NSW, vengono bussate alla porta e gli viene detto di lasciare la regione prima del fine settimana

text1: 我们是开放的：托德菲利普斯在“小丑”续集电影制片人托德菲利普斯说，如果一个理想的机会出现，他会进一步探索标志性的 DC 反派小丑。菲利普斯最近执导了《小丑》，其中华金·菲尼克斯饰演犯罪小丑。这部电影获得了评论家的压倒性评价，票房大获成功，全球票房收入超过 10 亿美元。从那以后，导演一直面临有关这部电影潜在续集的问题。菲利普斯在截止日期的纽约竞争者颁奖季活动中表示，他“愿意”与菲尼克斯重聚，但目前还没有最终确定。 “当一部电影的制作成本为 10 亿美元，制作成本为 6000 万美元时，当然会出现。但华金和我还没有真正决定。我们是开放的。“我的意思是，我会制作这个电影为我们工作，所以我们必须有一些具有同等主题共鸣的东西，”他补充说。（这个故事没有由商业标准工作人员编辑，是从联合提要自动生成的。
text2:
Joaquin Phoenix's Joker had a shocking alternative ending
Your browser does not support the audio element. Your browser does not support the audio element.

The blockbuster comic-book film "Joker" has a terrifying ending, but there was an even more shocking and horrifying alternative ending to Todd Phillips movie, starring Joaquin Phoenix in the starring role.

In a Fatman Beyond podcast recently, filmmaker Kevin Smith claimed that there was one alternative ending planned for the now blockbuster movie, reports independent.co.uk.

In the climax of the official version, Arthur Fleck aka Joker (Phoenix) follows Thomas and Martha Wayne and kills them, leaving young Bruce Wayne (who then goes to become Batman). In the alternate ending, Joker kills Bruce as well.

"Originally, the ending in the hospital was different. He's in the hospital and he laughs, chuckles, and he says, ‘I was just thinkin' of something funny'. What was supposed to happen was you flashed back to the death of Thomas and Martha Wayne, and it was him (Joker) killing Thomas and Martha Wayne and the boy was screaming and crying and he turned to walk away and he turned back, shrugged, and shot the kid. Credits," he said.

Smith said he was told the ending by someone "who works in the business" and called it "reliable information". He said: "It was too f***ing good not to share and I f***ing hope it's true".

The Warner Bros. project has become the highest-grossing R-rated movie of all time, and has crossed the $ 1 billion mark at the worldwide box office. In fact, the impact is deep as it has sparked conversation around mental health. A follow-up to film is also in the works.

Phoenix is being considered as a contender of Best Actor Oscar this year.

text1: Gewitter-Bilanz in Essen: Feuerwehr rückt 27 Mal aus  Am letzten Februarstag in Essen war es stürmisch. Aber kein Vergleich mit den vorherigen Wochenenden.ESSES. Es wird am Samstag stark eingeschraubt. Aber so schlecht wie an den Wochenenden, bevor es nicht war, machte die Feuerwehr ab. Hier sind die Details.Die Feuersbrigade-Lebensmittel war vorbestimmt: Der deutsche Wetterdienst hatte am Samstagnachmittag, 29. Februar, schwere Gewitter, auch über Lebensmittel vorhergesagt. Tatsächlich war von 15.00 Uhr über dem Stadtgebiet an vielen Orten ziemlich schnell der Himmel, der Wind fegte durch die Straßen und in einer Reihe von Bezirken, die es integriert haben. Nach der Bewertung der Dienstleistungsstatistik zog die Feuerwehr anschließend die Bilanz an: In der Zeit von 12 bis 21 Uhr zog die Kräfte insgesamt 27 Mal heraus, um Sturmschaden z nten Obergeschoss sichern. Im Gegensatz zu den vorangegangenen Wochenenden war der Gewittereinsatz vom Samstag eher unspektakulär, so das Resümee der Wachleitung. Am späteren Abend hatte sich die Wetterlage wieder beruhigt.
text2:
Windborne debris risk analysis - Part II. Application to structural vulnerability modeling -Wind and Structures
Abstract

The 'chain reaction' effect of the interaction between wind pressure and windborne debris is likely to be a major cause of damage to residential buildings during severe wind events. The current paper (Part II) concerns the quantification of such pressure-debris interaction in an advanced vulnerability model that integrates the debris risk model developed in Part I and a component-based wind-pressure damage model. This vulnerability model may be applied to predict the cumulative wind damage during the passage of particular hurricanes, to estimate annual hurricane losses, or to conduct system reliability analysis for residential developments, with the effect of windborne debris fully considered.

text1: So lief das Dülmener Silvesterkonzert : Auf Streifzug durch die Opernwelt Manchmal konnten die Zuschauer gar nicht abwarten. Der letzte Ton war noch nicht verklungen, die letzte Silbe noch nicht gesungen, da brandete schon der Applaus auf. Etwa als Diana Darnea in die Rolle der selbstbewussten Rosina aus „Der Barbier von Sevilla“ schlüpfte, oder Igor Storozhenko als verleumderischer Don Basilio eine Arie aus derselben Oper bot. Apropos Opern: Die standen im Mittelpunkt des Dülmener Silvesterkonzertes. Zum 23. Mal hatte der Förderverein für Kunst und Kultur zum musikalischen Jahresausklang in die Aula des Schulzentrums eingeladen. „Leckerbissen aus der Welt der Opern“, hatte Moderator Dr. Hans Wolfgang Schneider zu Beginn versprochen. Und genau solche waren es dann auch, die die Russische Zwischen den Auftritten der Sänger bot die Kammerphilharmonie zudem weitere bekannte Opern-Ausschnitte. Vor allem ihr „Can Can“ aus Offenbachs „Orpheus in der Unterwelt“ begeisterte die mitklatschenden Zuhörer
